All you saw was the white fur of her costume covered only by a pink apron, which just so happened to have a pentagram over the stomach. That goat being a costume may've excused the "nudity," but seeing this goat dressed only in an apron still made you feel weird looking at her, especially when the last person you saw wore clothes. Skimpy clothes, but clothes nonetheless.

Making things weirder was her body. Her hips were even wider than your shoulder span, and, even under her apron, you could see her bosom jutting out to the size of a beach ball. Her apron also did little to hide the guy she bore. You'd consider her a cute pudgy. She held an orange bowl, whose width was dwarfed by her gut.

"T-trick o-or treat," you said. You felt really nervous looking at her, to the point where you were scared to even say a full sentence.

"Oh my, what an adorable firefighter, pharaoh, and..." she began. Her voice sounded soft and caring. You almost felt like you could wrap yourself up with it like it were a warm blanket. Then, you realized someone else didn't know who you were.

"P-pirate," you answered.

"...and pirate!" she finished. She reached into her bowl, and you could hear the scrunching of candy wrappers. She pulled out a tiny handful of assorted candies, and dumped it into Maria's bag. Then she poured a tiny handful into Kevin's bag. And then she did the same with you. "You guys must've been getting a ton of treats." That made you remember one harrowing fact.

"Actually, we haven't," Kevin confessed.

"What?" the goat-wearer said. This time, her voice hurt. She sounded genuinely depressed at your situation, and hearing her sad made you feel worse. "How could little guys like you not be drowning in candy?"

"Yeah, the a lot of the neighborhood moved away, and the people that haven't don't usually give away a lot," you said.

"Oh, you poor things! I just wish I could do something..." she said. Then, she looked inquisitive, before snapping her fingers in a sudden moment of realization. "I just remembered I've got a ton of fresh candy deeper inside. Come along, I couldn't possibly carry it all by myself." She stepped aside and tried to wave you guys in. She sounded very nice, and maybe the smell of candy was clouding your judgment, but going in seemed like a good idea. Then again, your parents have always told you to never go in a stranger's house. Then again, she didn't seem like she was up to any ill will.
113.title: Tasty Treats House

choices: ... noticed you were missing, but couldn't tell why
... immediately realized that the goat had swallowed you
... were too preoccupied with their candy to even notice you were missing
1131.content:
You couldn’t resist. Sure, you weren’t supposed to trust strangers… but this lady seemed so nice, despite her strange costume. You didn’t want to hurt her feelings. “Alright. Lead the way!” You say with a smile, gesturing to your friends to come with. Maria followed alongside you as the goat trotted deeper into her fancy house. Kevin didn’t want to go inside, but he didn’t want to be left alone outside either, so he quickly caved to peer pressure and followed along with the two of you. The interior of the modest house proved just how wealthy this neighborhood was; the halloween decorations were as silly as they were impressive, and they seemed to cover every square inch of the goat’s home. You noticed a few odd things, though. There seemed to be quite a few pentagrams painted around the house, as well as depictions of baphomet among other odd shrines. They looked too well cared-for to be simple Halloween decorations.

You couldn’t help but notice her hips swaying as she walked, her rear end fully and shamelessly exposed to the three of you. It might not technically count as nudity, since it was probably just part of her costume… but still, it was oddly hypnotizing. This was the first time you’ve even come close to seeing a woman’s bare body, and it was quite an enchanting sight, especially with how unbelievably curvy the goat was. You noticed Kevin averting his eyes with a blush, self-conscious as ever, but you personally didn’t seen any harm in staring. Maria, of course, seemed wholly apathetic to the nudity, more curious about the goat’s ‘costume’ than anything else. It was an impressive costume, you had to admit. A convincing snout, moving eyes, the works. Facially, she looked much like a real goat, but much… prettier, somehow. You couldn’t really put your finger on it.

She eventually had you sit down on your comfy little couch, the room lit up by beautiful candles. “Just wait here, cuties. I’ll make this the tastiest Halloween you’ve ever had!” She said with a big, cute smile, looking even more excited then you were. She rushes into a back room, and the three of you can hear her rustling through boxes and cupboards as you sit in silence. Eventually, Kevin works up the courage to speak up.

“We should leave,” he says, wide-eyed. You and Maria stare him down, incredulous.

“Why would we do that?”

“We shouldn’t even be here. She’s a stranger!”

“We should at least wait until we get our candy.”

“What if she puts, like, razor blades in it or something?” He insists, and the two of you roll your eyes, annoyed by his constant cowardice. “I’m serious! Don’t you see all the weird satanic stuff all over the house? She could be trying to sacrifice us!”

“Maybe she’s just a pagan,” you offer. Kevin didn’t seem reassured, but before he could argue, the goat woman returned, her arms wrapped around a huge, pumpkin-shaped bucket of candy. It slammed into the ground as the goat woman dropped it onto the floor in front of Kevin, as the three of you stared at it in awe. Chocolate bars, bags of skittles and M&Ms… there had to be at least five pounds of candy in there! Kevin’s concerns were forgotten immediately as he accepted the bucket, almost trembling with barely-contained excitement. He didn’t even bother to check for razor blades as he tore into his delicious Halloween treats. Smiling brightly at his reaction, the goat retreated into the back room once again.

Maria looked enchanted by the bucket, and seemed almost ready to grab some candy from him until the goat returned once again. She offered another, similarly sized bucket of candy to the girl, and before you knew it, you were watching both of your friends with envy as they chomped down on your sweets. You could hear the goat lady searching around the back room again, but she seemed to be taking longer than usual. Hopefully you’d be getting your candy any second now. Eventually, she poked her head out the door, but this time she seemed downright worried. “Uh… pirate? Could you come back here, please?” You were a little reluctant, but you eventually agreed to head into the back room with her. Your friends were too busy chomping down on candy to even notice.

The back room seemed to be a regular pantry, with shelves lining the walls, lit up by a single light bulb. The goat woman closed the door behind you, you were just about to question her, when you realized she looked like she was on the verge of tears. “I-I’m… so, so sorry! Earlier, I got a little hungry, and… I ate, like, half my candy supply!” She said, apologizing to you desperately. “I don’t have enough candy left for you! I completely forgot!” You were a little disappointed, but it wasn’t as huge a deal as she seemed to be treating it. Before you could reassure her, though, she continued. “But don’t give up hope! You can still have the candy I ate! I swear it’s probably still good!”

You were so disoriented, you just accepted her offer without even thinking. “Uh, sure.”

She seemed surprised and excited when you said ‘yes’. “Oh, thank you! I promise, you won’t be disappointed again!” You were slightly startled when she grabbed you both shoulders… and you suddenly found yourself staring right into her gaping maw! For a costume, it looked so unbelievably realistic. Little drops of saliva even dripped down her chin, and you could feel her warm breath against your face. Her ‘tongue’ even seemed to move around of its own accord. You were so awed by her ‘costume’, you didn’t even resist when your head was suddenly plunged inside the tall goat woman’s mouth, and your cheek was suddenly resting on her tongue.

For some reason, you don’t even fight back as she grabs you by your sides and lifts you up in the air, preparing to swallow you down. Perhaps it was the same principle as why a kitten froze up when you held it by the scruff; you knew you’d probably hurt both the goat and yourself if you tried to fight back, so you opted instead to just trust her. The gruesome reality of being eaten didn’t even occur to you. To your addled, surprised mind, this made perfect sense; your candy was in her stomach, so obviously, she had to send you to her stomach so you could get to it. Thus, you were calm, at least, until your body was plunged into the tall, pudgy anthro’s throat.

Once your entire upper body was reduced to a bulge in her neck, you finally started to consider your situation. This was insane! First of all, you realized that there was no chance this was just a costume; your hostess was actually just a real, genuine goat/human hybrid. Worse still, you were halfway down her throat… and you knew what happened to food once it reached the stomach. Unfortunately, most of your body was already restrained, and your wriggling was so futile she didn’t even notice that you were struggling. There was nothing you could do as the goat woman leaned her head back and let gravity slide you deeper down her throat with another gulp. Soon, she closed her mouth around your feet, which rested on her tongue. With another gulp, those, too, disappeared into the tight confines of her throat.

With the consumption out of the way, you were finally dumped unceremoniously into the goat lady’s big, round belly, which stretched even more to accommodate you. It was around 100 degrees in there, and the walls were covered in strange liquids, but it wasn’t all that bad. You had some light in here, at least; just enough to see all the candy that surrounded you. Indeed, the goat already had about four bucket’s worth of candy stewing in her gut already, and there was a sizeable puddle of melted chocolate at the bottom of her stomach. “Mm! There you go! Nice and settled, with all the sweets you can eat,” she smiles once you were settled in, as she rubbed over her sensitive, distended gut with satisfaction. It was a relief to know you could hear each other through the thick walls of her belly. “Honestly, you were a tastier than the candy! So this is a pretty fair trade, I’d say.”

“Umm… I don’t really need any candy, on second thought,” you call, a little unnerved by the gurgling from all around you and the constant movement of her stomach’s walls. “You can just go ahead and let me out now!”

“Nonsense! There’s no need to be polite for my sake! I’m perfectly willing to let you stay in there for as long as you need,” she says. “Now, go ahead! Try a bite! I’ve been told my sweets are absolutely addicting!” You shrug, deciding it wouldn’t hurt to try a kit-kat, at least. You could just pretend the candy was all spoiled or half-digested; surely, that would convince the goat to let you out. You tentatively take a bite, only to be stunned by the taste. This was… the most delicious chocolate you’ve ever eaten! You finished the kit-kat in an instant, and without thinking, you grab another piece of candy, and then another, and then another. You understood the goat’s binge, now; these were amazing! You had completely forgotten about your desire to escape, so preoccupied shoving candy down your throat like a maniac. You were in paradise!

The goat giggled, patting her gut as she noticed you were enjoying yourself within. Content she had made things up to you, she emerged back into the living room, nursing her now much larger gut; so huge it pushed up her apron. Your friends...
1131.title: Delicious Treats

choices: Go back to get Hugo and try to leave this freaky town
Uh oh, you feel the goat lady’s hands grab your shoulders
Continue onward to some more houses
1132.content:
You were lost in thought as you pondered over the situation. Sure this goat lady seemed to have a ton of candy, and it did smell delicious, but you could probably get some candy elsewhere. You didn’t need to get it from her. Plus, it’s odd that she ‘just remembered’ she had a stockpile of candy. If she really did have that much candy, why was it not in her candy bowl by the door? But she did seem very sweet and nice so you decided to try to word your decline in a kind manner. You smiled up at the grinning, curvy goat, “Um, thank you so much miss. We really appreciate it. But we’ll go to another house. We don’t want to bother you anymore than we already have.”

You were about to go before the goat chimed in, “Oh sweetie pie, it’s no trouble at all. I’m more than happy to give you as much candy as you’d like.” The goats sweet offer and tone seemed more sinister now that you were trying to leave, and you could feel her eyes bore into you.

Maria joined in, “We’re really sorry miss but it’s almost past our curfew and we need to start heading home,” she lied.

The goat giggled, “Oh, it’ll only take a quick second.” You could’ve sworn you heard her belly rumbling. Was the pentagram on her apron glowing?

Maria shook her head, “I’m sorry miss but we really need to get going. Thank you for the candy.”

You three turn around and start to walk away from the house. That was a little strange and that goat lady was a little too overzealous about giving you more candy. But the night was still young, and there were still many houses to go to. But what if the goat woman spotted you three still around the neighborhood? What now?

Don't worry Kevin, I will be fine!

You shake off the thought and soon come across what looks like some muffins. Based on the smell, it seems that they are just pulled out from the oven.

You started to feel funny as you finish up the muffin. You shake it off as being nothing and reach over to grab another muffin...only to notice the table is getting bigger...and so is the chair you are sitting on!

You then start to panic, thinking this goat lady slipped some kind of hallucinogen drug into your muffin. Before you could get your bearings, the goat lady comes back into the room with a smirk on her face.

"Oh, ate a shrinking muffin, was hoping it would work this year...

Just before you could reply, the goat lady turns around and exposes her furry butt. You blush heavily as the pudgy butt cheeks get exposed. "Mmmff, them kids from earlier is making me gassy...oh right, your friends!"

She then gets up and starts to head to the front door with you stuck in her rear, breathing in the lingering fumes. Before she answers the door, she pushes you in a bit further to hide you from the other kids...

As she opens the door back up to invite your friends in...

The goat opened the door and smiled. They were still there waiting patiently.

”I’m sorry, but your friend has decided to help me on a very important task.” The goat explained. You tried to struggle out of her butt as they spoke. If you could get out and get to your friends, they would definitely help you.

”That’s ok, we can come back later for him.” Maria said, smiling. Kevin nodded, though he couldn’t help but feel something was up, since this was the second friend they were leaving behind for now. As your two friends left, you could hear the goat shut the door. The sound halted your struggles. You would never be able to get to your friends now! As if to respond, the goat giggled and walked deeper into her house.

The goat kept thinking about her new catch. This one was cuter than the others and was sure to bring her more joy. Besides, if he disobeyed, she knew that he would be a tasty snack for her. The goat went up to her bedroom and pulled out her victim. She threw you onto the bed and smiled at your fear. She was going to have you…

She then decided to lay out on her stomach and wiggles her big rear at you. "Since you have a fascination with my rear, why don't you come over and give it some love...Although I do feel PECKISH...". You cringe and before you could think of trying to resist, you go over to the thick rear and starts to rub a bit into her rump cheeks. The goat smiles and reaches a hand back to pull a cheek back to pull you back into the rank rear, causing you to stumble in until you bump into her tail hole. You cringe heavily from the smell, but decided to rub at the pucker, causing the goat to start moaning. You keep rubbing at the tail hole until it opens up a little, pulling your small arms in. You panic a bit, but keep rubbing at the warm insides, causing the goat lady to moan louder as you unknowingly rub further up her rear despite the smell...

As you unknowingly push in fully up into the goat's rank tail hole...

114.content:
An old victorian mansion, it seemed, converted into a cheap little haunted house by its owners. Apparently, this event was running for all of October, but people who arrive on the night of halloween get in free. Your friends were nervous, but you didn’t want to miss this potentially once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, so you eagerly rush up to the front door and ring the bell.

Almost immediately, a woman who looked to be around 20 opened the door… but just like her neighbor, her costume made her look just some kind of anthropomorphic animal! She was also similar in height, at seven feet, and her ‘outfit’ was even equally skimpy, wearing only a black bra, panties and top hat to contrast her white fur. Unlike her neighbor, she seemed to be a canine of some sort. You wonder if this neighborhood was having a ‘themed’ halloween this year, for some reason. “Ooo! Welcome travellers, to the Maniacal Manor of Misery!” She announced, in a cheesy, ‘spooky’ voice as she stepped out to greet you. “Can you survive the twiiisted halls, and the spoooky horrors hiding within?”

“Why does everyone around here wear animal costumes?” You ask, staring at her thick fur. She looked so realistic!

“... I do not know what you are referring to, travelleeer!” She said, trying to stay in character. “I am simply here to guide you into the Maniacal Manor of Misery!”

“Is there candy?” Maria asked, desperate to fill her bag with more sweets.

“Brooownies are provided for freee at the end of the atraaaction!” The half-naked canine explained, in the same ghostly voice. “If you can make it that far, that is… ahahaha!” She lets out a corny attempt at an evil laugh as she sets aside, gesturing for you to enter the darkened halls of the mansion. There seemed to be a fog machine hidden somewhere, as you could see the ground through the darkened fog as you stepped eagerly inside.

“I-I’m not sure about this,” Kevin whispered nervously as the three of you walked inside. “I don’t really like haunted houses…”

“What? This one is super cheesy. Are you seeing her acting?” You whisper with a chuckle. This wasn’t a real haunted house, obviously; it was probably just something a bunch of bored college students set up. “Besides, I haven’t had any brownies for as long as I can remember.”

“I think it looks fun!” Maria says, lightly punching his shoulder with a laugh. “Don’t be a scaredy-cat.”

“Okay, okay… I guess…” He said, agreeing to accompany you if only just to avoid looking cowardly in front of his friends.

“Foools! You know not what great risks you are taking here!” She says, in the same melodramatic voice, before she leans over and whispers for a moment, breaking character. “Right this way. Watch your step. It’s sort of dark in there.”

“Thanks,” you say, walking through a curtain into the haunted house proper. “Wish us luck!”

“I am already writing your obituuuaaaries!” She said with a smile as you walked away, getting a laugh out of the three of you. The inside of the house seemed like a regular old victorian mansion, that has had the lights turned off and been redecorated. The only decorations were ‘creepy’ pumpkins, dancing skeletons, fake bats, and the like. “Prepare to meet your dooooom!” One of the fake skeletons ‘shouted’, startling Kevin slightly, while only eliciting a laugh from you and Maria. As you wandered through the various ‘spooky’ rooms of the manor, you start to feel at ease. This wasn’t really scary; it was just sort of fun!

As you travel deeper and deeper into the manor, though, things started to get scarier and scarier. The darkness only seemed to grow thicker, and hallways more confused. The jumpscares grew louder and more intense; the visuals became more disturbing, and soon, the three of your were covered in traces of fake blood, which smelled quite like ketchup. Kevin was freaking out at this point, and you and Maria were growing scared as well… but you definitely wouldn’t be able to navigate your way out of here. Most of the jumpscares involved anthropomorphic animals, though you were always too shocked to tell if they were real or animatronic.

Eventually, while wandering through the darkened halls, you realized you no longer could hear your friend’s footsteps following behind you. You whimpered audibly when you realized they were suddenly gone! The three of you must have gotten separated somehow in the darkness. You take a moment to try and calm yourself down. It seems like you’ve been stuck in this mansion forever; you were bound to find the way out, sooner or later…

┄┄┄

Meanwhile, Kevin was absolutely panicking at this point, having realized quickly that he was alone in the manor. He sprinted through the darkness, calling your names, but his voice just echoed through the halls, unheard. The hallways branched out in all sorts of confusing ways, and just when he thought he was making progress, he ended up right back where he started. He was quickly losing all hope for escape. To him, it seemed like the house simply didn’t have an exit; he would be trapped here, forever and ever…

Just when he thought he was alone, he ran into one last jumpscare. This time, though, it definitely wasn’t an animatronic -- it was one of the employees! To him, she appeared to be a college-age woman dressed as a creepy...
114.title: Maniacal Manor of Misery

1141.content:
Kevin jumped back, startled at the sight of her. The fear grew more when she put her hand on his shoulder. Her hand was rough and he could feel the sharp claws on his skin. Her body was covered in scales and her eyes looked into his soul. As she smiled, Kevin could tell that at her full height, she would tower over him.

“It looks like a nice little morsel has found its way into my grasp.” She said, circling around him slowly. Kevin wanted to run, but her tail was blocking the way. Within a couple of seconds of looking at her tail, the boy realized the truth. He tried to scream only for the dragon to cover his mouth. “Shh. We don’t want to wake up the spirits now do we? They’ll possess you and mess with you in horrible ways.” The dragon’s voice was soft and sweet despite her monstrous size.

“But you’re going to mess with me too!” Kevin said, afraid to move. The dragon giggled and moved to his front.

“I won’t torture you. Besides, if you play along, It won’t hurt a bit.”

“Really?”

“Of course, all you need to do is look into my mouth. I won’t hurt you.” Kevin was a little nervous but it was better than her hurting him badly. The dragon’s mouth opened revealing the ominous cavern. Kevin leaned in and looked. She had incredibly sharp teeth and a slithery tongue. Before he could react though, the dragon launched forward and grabbed him with her mouth. The dragon ignored his struggles and stood to her full height. With little effort, she slurped him up like a noodle and moaned. “I said it would be painless, but I didn’t say you were just going to walk away. Her claws rubbed her full belly as Kevin made his landing into the pool. It was incredibly warm, and it wasn’t just because of the acids. The boy went to the wall and pounded hoping to upset her stomach, unfortunately she showed no signs of change.

————————————

Maria shuddered, she could feel that something bad just happened, and she wasn’t looking forward to finding out. Still, she pressed on until she came across a nice bedroom. She let herself have a moment to relax after being frightened before and laid down on the large bed. She’s closed her eyes for a moment when suddenly, the door swung open. Maria sat up fast and saw…
1141.title: How to not train a dragon

choices: Alligator!
Bear!
Wolf!
1142.content:
His heart skipped a beat as he ran headlong into another jump scare, and time seemed to pass by in slow motion. Even through the darkness, he could tell this wasn’t some sort of animatronic; it was definitely a real person, leaping out at him from around a corner as a head-achingly loud scare chord played. This was obvious from the way she moved; instead of just sliding out out hiding, she seemed to maneuvering straight towards him. This knowledge was made even more disconcerting by the fact that her silhouette was 8 feet tall, almost twice his height. She was moderately ‘curvaceous’ too, you could say, her belly alone being almost as wide as he is tall. As she emerged into the light, Kevin realized the woman was dressed in a similar costume as the others in the neighborhood, but this one seemed to be a cow of some sort. This one wasn’t wearing any clothes at all over their costume, revealing her costume to not only be unbelievably realistic, but also quite… anatomically correct.

Not like that’s what he was focussing on at the moment. He was a bit more preoccupied by the huge cow lady’s jaws hanging hungrily open, giving the boy a clear view into the darkness of her cavernous throat. He had no time to react. All he could do was try to make sense of what he was seeing. Her ‘fur’ and snout were already seemingly impossibly realistic enough, but her mouth was really pushing the limit. There was no way it could just be a part of the mask -- her maw just looked too real, slid open too fluidly. Even in that instant, he could feel her warm, smelly breath blast his face, and feel the saliva glancing off her teeth. As she grew closer, she only looked more and more real -- even her long, flat pink tongue was hanging out the corner of her mouth, in anticipation for her meal.

Just before darkness swallowed him, his mind reached one final, terrifying realization -- she wasn’t wearing a costume.

Overall, the single instant in which the cow leaped out at the boy felt like it lasted forever. Soon enough, though, the adrenaline rush faded away, as he was left to deal with the reality of his situation. The mouth that closed around his head was definitely real, for starters, as indicated by the saliva wetting his hair. The rest of the cow’s body was real, too, particularly her unbelievably hefty bust. Considering these faces, odds are, her stomach’s not fake either… and judging from the way she’s holding him, that seems to be where she’s planning on sending the boy. “Aaahhh!” Kevin finally let out a scream, just a moment too late -- now, his voice was simply muffled by the cow woman’s mouth. Her amazonian height lent her incredible strength, and she was able to easily restrain the boy against her pudgy body as she repositioned him to better slurp him up like a noodle. The process was terrifyingly fast; this obviously wasn’t her first rodeo. She knew he would confused and disoriented at first as he tried to figure out what was going on, so she used this time to immediately fit his wide shoulders into her throat. Those were the widest part of every human’s body, so once they were in, the rest of her halloween treat would be easy.

It wasn’t until he was already a quarter way into her throat that Kevin’s addled mind pieced together what was happening enough to start fighting back, kicking and wriggling with all his might. He was actually making some progress, for a moment, before the cow noticed and restrained him even more tightly. For such a pudgy young woman, she definitely had some serious muscle. Kevin knew he was running out of time; the more he disappeared down the bovine’s throat, the easier it became for her to gulp him down faster, and the harder it became for him to resist. At this point, though, he feared it may already be too late; his arms were already pressed against his side by the tight, disgusting tunnel of the cow’s throat, and her grasp on his legs meant he couldn’t even throw any kicks. He was basically immobilized completely as his upper body was buried in her throat; all he could do was wriggle around, and try to position himself in such a way that she couldn’t swallow him any deeper.

For a few seconds, the cow woman seemed to struggle to gulp him down any further, and Kevin finally had a flicker of hope, believing he had successfully delayed his descent. If he can just keep this up, eventually the cow will choke and be forced to spit him out, right? Unfortunately for him, in reality, the cow was simply pausing to savor his flavor. She only gets a treat like this once a year, so she wanted to make it last. Still, a gurgle from her hungry gut reminds her of the task at hand. She’s been subsisting on a liquid diet for a week to fully empty her stomach and bowels in preparation for her upcoming feast, and now, her belly was begging to finally be filled. With a snort, she decided it was time to get this over with. She leaned her head back, letting Kevin’s kicking legs hang in the air, until, with the assistance of gravity, she took another grand gulp, sliding her prey deeper at a terrifying speed. In an instant, the only part of him that remained in the cow’s maw was his feet, uselessly wriggling against the back of her mouth. She closed her mouth with a giggle, licking her lips as she sealed her prey’s entire body in darkness.

His heart skipped a beat as his upper body was suddenly dropped into the cow’s stomach proper. Eventually, the cow swallowed down his feet as well, leaving nothing to prevent him from slipping entirely into her waiting gut. The walls of the sac stretched easily, giving him the illusion of wriggle room at; but whenever he wasn’t manually forcing them to bulge out, the walls would contract back into place around him, curling him up into a ball. It was of course around body temperature inside her, around a sweltering 99 degrees, and it felt like he was stuck in a wet, fleshy sauna. Seemingly excited by the huge meal, her guts began churning and gurgling loudly as they prepared to process him, and he noticed a small puddle of strange liquids pooling beneath him. His screams were muffled completely by the thick, fleshy walls, as any sign of him was completely lost to the outside world.

Meanwhile, the young bovine woman was giggling and squirming in delight at the sensation of such a large, lively meal. She was a little worried about her friends ‘haunted house’ plan… if they didn’t get any visitors, she might end up wasting her halloween! It all worked out in the end, though, it seems. The pudgy, college-age bovine sat, naked as they day she was born, on a nearby chair, rubbing all over her rounded, distended belly with satisfaction. The feeling of such lively prey inside your stomach is half the fun of halloween, after all. Eventually though, she got over the initial buzz, and excitedly took out her phone, to post an image for all her followers of her big, round, perfect furry gut stretching out of the front of her chubby, naked body, along with the caption;

Just got a tasty treat delivered straight to my door! 👅🍬🤰 Will keep U updated on digestion! Happy #Halloween! 😜🎃

┄┄┄


Meanwhile, Kevin’s friends continued to navigate their way through the mansion, completely oblivious to his grisly fate. Maria, for instance, was currently mapping out the mansion in her head, trying to figure out its secrets. The geometry just didn’t make any sense; the twisting halls of the ‘maniacal manor’ seemed downright non-euclidean. She could walk in a perfectly straight line, and end up right back where she started! Of course, it couldn’t be magic or anything; she deduced that there had to be some sort of illusion at play here. All of the light-hearted fun of the haunted house had faded away, as she set to diligently searching for whatever secrets might be hidden in the darkness. She tried to be especially cognizant of secret passageways or subtle changes in slope which might explain some of the inconsistencies she’s noticed, but so far she’s had no luck in figuring out the trick.

A few things further frustrated her investigation. No matter how many times she wandered through an area, new jumpscares seemed to appear each time, a fact which further confused her. It was like the entire manor was changing all around her as she searched. Eventually, she collapsed into one of the old, dusty victorian chairs, chomping down on some of the candy in her bag to calm her nerves. This cheap suburban haunted house proved to be much more complex than she imagined. Once they noticed she had given up, certainly the staff of this place would give her a clue or something, right? She certainly didn’t want to waste the rest of her halloween here.

Eventually, while relaxing on the chair, Maria felt someone behind her tap her shoulder. She looked over her shoulder excitedly, thinking it was one of her friends, or perhaps a staff member here to aid her. Instead, though, there was only an unbelievably tall man looming over the chair, who seemed to be dressed as some sort of...
1142.title: Cow's Gluttony

choices: Continue
11422.content:
“Boo!”

Maria leaned her head back against the headrest to see whoever was looming over her, only for a pudgy, furry brown belly to block her vision. She only realized what she was looking at when the bear leaned forward, revealing his smirking face. By this point, it was already too late to flee; she already felt two huge paws grab her by the sides, lifting her up out of her chair with terrifying ease. She yelped at the sudden ascent, until she was hugging against the bear’s soft, pillowy belly. She felt a bit of drool drip down onto her cheek as the bear audibly licked his lips, signifying that he was, of course, not actually just a costumed millionaire, but an actual natural-born predator. She should be surprised by this, but really, once she had felt the bear’s immense paws, there wasn’t a doubt in her mind that she had somehow run into a real, anthropomorphic bear. She’d have time to go over hows and whys later -- right now, all she could focus on was her primitive fight-or-flight instinct.

The bear simply chuckled as she began to fight back in earnest, her kicks bouncing off his belly like a drum and her hands unable to pry the bear’s claws away. Still, he was impressed by how calm and calculated she was in her attempts. She was smart; if given enough time, should could’ve definitely come up with an escape plan, but the bear provided her no such luxury. Being herbivorous, the taste of meat had been a special treat for the cow -- but being a carnivore himself, the bear was bored by the taste of meat, and more interested in the delightful squirminess of live prey. She’d go down much faster than her friend had; indeed, Maria could already feel the warm breath of the ursine atop her head as he parted his jaws.

The bear took a deep breath, and with a single, mighty shove, his wide, muscular throat easily accepting her head and shoulders. All of her escape plans were immediately forgotten as panic and shock overtook her reasoning, and she began to kick and punch wildly at the air, with no rhyme or reason. This, of course, failed to aid her situation; and with another mighty gulp, she was up to her elbows in the tight, wet confines. As the bear paused, seemingly amused by her struggles, Maria tried to calm herself, trying to come up with another plan while she still could. She tried to brace her arms against the sides of the bear’s mouth, blockading her descent into the anthro’s belly. This actually worked for a while… until, of course, the bear got frustrated and simply moved her arms out of the way with sheer overwhelming strength. As her arms were pressed against her sides, restraining her upper body completely, Maria realized it was far too late to escape now. Maybe an opportunity would present itself when she reached the stomach, but as far as her current circumstances… she was out of luck.

To the bear’s surprise, Maria decided to go gracefully, relaxing and letting her legs be slurped up like a noodle by the hungry carnivore. She was too disoriented and dizzy at this point to come up with any coherent plan anyway. Seeing her amusing struggles had ended, it only took a few seconds more for the bear to finish off his meal completely. Being a carnivore, the bear’s stomach was even more miserable than the cow’s; not that she’d have such a basis for comparison. It was hotter, tighter, and more worryingly, she was already up to her chest in the caustic liquids. Maria whimpered, trying her best to keep her head above the liquid, even as the bear shaked and jostled her prison for his own amusement. As she settled in, though, she realized something even her observant mind hadn’t noticed before. There was already another trick-or-treater in here!

She seemed to be dressed as a vampire or something, although her costume was completely ruined by this point. Compared to the confused and wide-eyed new arrival, the other trick-or-treater looked cynical and defeated in comparison. “H-how long have you been in here!?” Maria managed to yell over the surprisingly loud gurgling and churning of the bear’s stomach.

“Я не говорю по английски,” The girl replied, speaking in a panicked tone in an indecipherable language while Maria sat there, uncomprehending. The other girl definitely didn’t look, nor sound, like she came from remotely nearby. Could it be that… she isn’t? Maria’s heart sunk as she finally put two and two together, and realized the true nature of this place. She had heard rumors -- impossible rumors, she thought -- that Vampyre Lane wasn’t actually a physical place, but another realm overlapping reality. A realm only accessible on Halloween night, and only to those with a sufficient desire to find it. Indeed, this entire neighborhood was a spider’s web -- designed to lure naive humans into the jaws of these monsters. The second she walked inside, she was already doomed…

Meanwhile, the bear let out an unbelievably loud, nasty belch as yet another satisfying meal settled inside his now bulging belly. He turned, sitting his completely nude, pudgy body down on the same dusty chair Maria had been relaxing in, the wood cracking beneath his weight. He licked his lips as he rubbed his paws over his gut, feeling the movement of two whole humans within. While most anthros would be more than satisfied with this arrangement, the gluttonous bear’s Halloween fun was still far from over. Even now, he still had room for one or two more trick-or-treaters before he was completely stuffed. It would probably be terrible for his health, of course… but doesn’t he deserve to splurge, every once in awhile? After all, everyone needs a treat on Halloween…

┄┄┄


Even while all this was occurring, you were completely unaware of everything that had happened to your friends, so wrapped up were you in the maniacal mansion’s elaborate puzzle. For a while, you had been on the verge of giving up, believing the machinations of the manor to be complete nonsense… eventually, though, you started to see the purpose behind every nook and cranny, every out-of-place book and uncalibrated grandfather clock. You were fortunately always fascinated by riddles and such, and thus, you were the first one to have the diligence to see the manor’s puzzle through to the end, even as an untold amount of time passed. Eventually, you had figured everything out and put it all in its proper place, and right before your eyes, one last secret passageway opened up in the wall of the main chamber.

You stepped curiously through, raising a hand as your eyes adjusted to the sudden onslaught of light, only to find yourself in a much more homely little room. The ‘canine’ gal from before was standing on the other end, and you averted your eyes with a blush when you realized all of her outer clothing was gone, and only her weird animal costume remained. You couldn’t tell if she was simply wearing body paint or what, but even nude, her costume was… disturbingly detailed. She giggled at your innocence, as she slowly draws closer. “Congratulations. You finished our little puzzle,” she said in a genuinely creepy voice now, all her previous light-heartedness completely disappeared. “Honestly, I thought nobody would be able to manage it this year.”

You tried to back up from the canine, only to run into a strange, pillowy, furry surface. You turned around, letting out a startled little squeal as you saw the cow lady towering over you, her belly uncannily rounded. “It’s almost a shame, sugar. You looked tasty…” The cow said, crossing her arms with a smile. You could hardly believe your eyes as you saw hand prints bulging out against the sides of the cow’s belly. That couldn’t possibly be part of the costume. Could it be…?

You backed away from the cow, too, only to once again run into another anthro’s distended belly. This time, you turned to see a massive bear, smiling at you with a disturbingly toothy grin, showing off his fangs. “Your friends certainly were…” He taunted, rubbing a hand over his huge stomach. For a moment, you could clearly see Maria’s face imprint against the side, and it felt like your heart had stopped in your chest. You became light-headed as the simple truth of the situation flooded you; these monsters were real, and they have devoured your friends. And, judging by the look on the canine's face, you were next on the menu.

“W-why them?” was all you could ask, tears forming as the three massive anthros circled you.

“Because they gave up. You persevered. You found a way to the final chamber of the mansion,” the canine smirked, just a few feet away from you now. “But now… you have to find the way out. And I’ll be right behind you every step of the way...” Suddenly, she leaped forward, trying to pounce on top of you! You dodged her attack by inches, your flight-or-flight instincts sending you sprinting away wildly, with no knowledge of where you were going. The bear and cow simply stood there, laughing as they watched the canine chase you through the darkened hallways of the manor on all fours.

You had figured out the first half of your trial, but the true test of survival had only just begun...
11422.title: and a Bear's Greed

choices: Hide behind the fake bookshelf
Hide in the secret chamber
114221.content:
You didn’t have time to rationalize the horrifying and seemingly impossible events that had just occurred. You were busy running for your life through the halls of the manor, your heart beating out of your chest as the canine woman chased you on all fours like some kind of savage predator. Your only saving grace was that the canine was so large and moved so quickly, the sheer inertia alone made it difficult for her to take corners. Still, she wised up to this quickly, and began gaining on you at a terrifying rate. “S-stay away from me!” You yelled, pushing down a huge cabinet to block the bath behind you as you ran, which ultimately failed to slow the canine down for even an instant, as she hopped right over it.

“Where are you going? You don’t even know the way out of here!” She called after you, her tongue hanging out the side of her mouth as she chased you, as if this was just some sort of game. You shuddered, realizing she was right. You were so preoccupied finding your way deeper into the manor, you had never bothered to find the way out. You had no idea how you would figure out that puzzle with the canine hot on your tail. “Just give up now, like your friends! I can make things easy for you!” Worse still, you could tell that the canine was going easy on you. If she wanted to, she could be sprinting much faster, and be upon you in moments. Was she just toying with you… making you believe there was any chance of escape, just to take all your hope away in the end? You began to feel demoralized, and as your adrenaline rush fades, you find it harder and harder to keep running.

Eventually, you stumbled back into the main chamber, exhausted and confused. The canine would be entering in just a few seconds, and yet you simply couldn’t muster the energy to flee. You needed to find a place to hide, a place where you can recoup your energy… but where? The anthro woman could probably see just fine in the dark, and knew this manor like the back of her hand. You would have to think outside the box.

You could hide behind one of the fake bookcases in the main hall. It was sort of an obvious hiding spot, but if you act fast and cover your tracks, she might just rush by, thinking you were still fleeing, It was such a concealed little alcove, she definitely wouldn’t notice you there if she wasn’t directly searching for you. Then again, you could also return to the deepest chamber of the house. She would never think to look for you there, although it had its own risks; mainly the fact that the cow and the bear were probably still there. Then again, they seemed reluctant to interfere, for some reason.

You only had less than a second to decide. Where would you end up hiding?
114221.title: The Chase Begins

choices: Attempt to push her off just as her breath got stronger
You begrudgingly give in and ask to be her "toy", whatever she means
You manage to knock her off and break free running
1142211.content:
You decided to take the risk and hide behind one of the fake bookcases. You quickly slipped behind the bookcase just as the white furred canine ran past you. You panted for a bit and look back out to see that she is gone. You waited for a few minutes and look back out again to see that the canine is still gone. You begin to relax a little, but you were quickly knocked down out of surprise as the powerful canine pounces on you, panting heavily after her run.

"Did you really think you would go far human?" She said in a smug tone. You attempt to push her back off of you, but she had pinned you down hard on the ground as she keeps panting deeply.

"Since you were smarter than your friends, I will give you a chance to live..." She said, starting to sound seductive.

"You can either let me use you as a um, "toy", in a sort of way" She said as she wiggles her now exposed rear lightly

"Or you could end up as a bit of pudge on my hips!" She said as she snaps at you.

You pondered your choices for a bit. You weren't that thrilled about being food to a slutty looking canine, especially considering the fact that her breath smells like a morgue full of corpses. You also didn't like the idea of being some kind of adult toy to this mutt also.

After a few minutes of pondering and having to smell her horrible breath, you decided too...
1142211.title: Hide behind the fake bookshelf

choices: Save yourself
Stay there and try to save your friends
1142212.content:
You decided that the chamber was your only real hope of slipping away from the canine unseen. The cow and the bear were already ‘full’, so they wouldn’t have any cause to attack you… right? You slipped through the secret entrance you had previously uncovered, and closed it silently behind you, moments before the canine ran hurriedly by. You tensed up, hearing her rush down the hallway, until breathing a sigh of relief when she was finally out of earshot. You silently pulled the door open again, peeking into the hallway, holding your breath as you check to see if she was really gone. Just as the tension was at its highest, you yelped in fright as you felt a hand grab your shoulder from behind. “Aaahhh!” You reacted, whipping around, only to see the bear towering over you.

“Whoa! Relax, buddy,” he said, pushing the door closed so the canine wouldn’t hear — which had the added effect of locking you in here with him. You looked up at his smiling face, stunned, as you took in every detail of his bare - no pun intended - body. Knowing that it wasn’t just a costume, you were stunned at his features. You had never seen anything quite like him before. You were about eye-level with his huge belly, too, and cringed when you saw visible hand prints from the inside. He crossed his arms, smirking as he looked down on you. “You made the right choice comin’ back here. This is actually where the key’s hidden.”

He stepped aside, to reveal the cow sitting on a nearby, dusty couch, dangling the keys in the air. “You missed them the first time! I thought you were a goner!” She giggled, waving them around, beckoning to you. A bit of hope returned to you. They may be your literal key out of this terrible place…

“You want ‘em, right?” The bear said, wrapping an arm around your shoulder. “Then let's have a seat.” You didn’t want to do as he said, but with his sheer natural strength, you were powerless to disobey. Soon, you were made to join the two nude anthros on the couch, squished up between them as they lounged around. They were about 8 feet tall each, and quite chubby, leaving you very little space on the couch — making matters worse, you were about belly-level, and their bellies were churning and gurgling incredibly loudly as they worked on the people within. You shuddered, trying to focus on your objective; the key. She seemed to have it absent-mindedly clutched in her other hand while she types away at her phone.

“S-so… w-what are you up to?” You said, gesturing to her phone, trying to figure out how you were going to get the keys from her.

“Oh, I’m just keeping my fans updated! They love seeing pics of my belly when it’s all big and round,” she smiles, giggling as she jiggles her gut up and down with a hand. “Especially when it’s filled with such a lively, squirmy meal!” You’ve deduced that Kevin is in the cow’s belly, and Maria is in the bear’s; meaning that Kevin probably has much more time before it’s too late to save him, as morbid as that thought was.

“Do you think you might…” You ask, knowing you had to come up with some way to free your friends. “Let him out afterwards?”

“Heavens, no! And give up such a delightful treat?” she waves a hand dismissively, as if the very notion was ridiculous. “Nope, your friend here’s just going to be churned up into another year’s supply of delicious milk! Maybe a little fat, too — I wouldn’t mind!”

“But that’s…” You said, tears forming in your eyes. “You can’t j-just… do that to somebody.”

“Oh, c’mon. It’s all in good fun!” The bear laughed, jokingly punching you lightly in the shoulder, startling you. “They were warned there were risks when they walked in here. That’s what makes our haunted house so thrilling; the danger is real!” The cow smiled and nodded in agreement, while you just looked at him, horrified at his logic. He frowned, seeing you still weren’t satisfied. “Hey. This is our only chance all year for snacks like this, and your friends fit the bill. How would it benefit us to let them out?” You stared at the ground sadly, unable to answer his question. Seeing you were defeated, he raised the key up in front of your face, letting you grab it with a hand. “Look. Our friend’s still out there, searching for you. She’ll probably be here any minute now. I advise you focus on saving yourself, pal.”

You clutch at the key. It was your ticket out of here, and yet… could you really justify just leaving your friends behind? You couldn’t abandon them, but… if you stayed, you’d probably just be devoured as well. How would that help anything? Once again, you needed to make a choice quickly… and this was probably the hardest choice of all...
1142212.title: A Brief Reprieve

choices: The candy was sort of... weird
It was just normal candy
11422121.content:
You could hardly even contemplate the choice you were being forced to make. All you knew for certain is that staying here and suffering the same fate… just wasn’t an option. You needed to find a way out of this nightmarish mansion. Maybe, once you’re free, you’ll be able to call the police ro something to come help your friends. Hardly able to see through your tears, you finally swing work up the willpower to turn, swing the door open, and go stomping out of the chamber.

Now that you had the key, the manor suddenly looked completely different. It didn’t feel like you were lost in some endless maze of hallways anymore. It was as if it had returned back to being… just a normal house. You could see the front door just on the other hand of a hallway, and with no clue of where your pursuer was, you make a break for it. This almost proved a fatal mistake; you only barely managed to duck under the canines claws as she leaped at you from the darkness of the hallway. “Not so fast!” She taunted as you fell to the ground in shock, trying to crawl desperately away from the canine woman. She seemed to be rearing up to pounce once again, and it seemed like it’d be too late to flee out of the way of this one.

Just as she leaped for you, your hand happened to land on a broken, wooden handrail bar… and without a second thought, you swing it at her with all of your might. “Augh!” She yowled as she stumbled back, covering her bloodied snout. While she was distracted, you slid past her, sprinting down the hallway once again. “Hey! Get back here!” Slowed by her injury but ever more eager to capture you, she chases dizzily after you down the hall, to the point that you can feel her just a few inches behind you as you approach the door. Just a few more steps, and you’d be home free…

The canine leaped forward in a last-ditch effort when you made it to the door, ending up wrapping her arms around you and sending you both plummeting right through the front door! Bits of wood and glass splintered all around you as the door was blown off its hinges by the force of the canine’s pounce, as the two of you finally land on the cold sidewalk outside. Fortunately, the canine broke you fall… but unfortunately, you were still wrapped tightly in her arms, unable to squirm free! However, to your surprise, instead of just devouring you right there, she started to laugh. “Hehehehe!” She giggled, hugging you gently closer, as if this had all been just a big game. “Oh… that was fun! You really gave me a run for my money, there!”

You whimpered as the huge canine lady stood up, cradling you in her arms. “Well, you were the first one to make it through the Maniacal Manor. So… congrats!” She smiled, holding you against her nude form as she carried you back towards the house. “I think you deserve a special prize; every single treat we have, on the house!” You squealed and squirmed when you realized she was taking you back inside, desperate not to have to return to that terrible manor… only to realize that the interior of the mansion now looked completely normal. There were a few halloween decorations all over the place, sure, but the house was actually quite well-lit and homely.

“Oh, don’t worry. That whole maze you saw was all in your head! We got ol’ Serafine to cast some illusionary spells on the house for us, making it seem spooky and haunted to newcomers. Clever, right?” She said, setting you down on the carpeted floor. You looked around like a deer in headlights, and the canine just gestured to the living room, where the bear and cow were sitting on that very same couch, watching TV. “We’ve actually got a pretty nice place here. Go on, make yourself at home.” The canine walked down the hall into the kitchen, clutching her bloodied snout. “I’ll go clean up. Then, you can have your prize!”

You stood there for a while, trying to comprehend what you were hearing. Once you had escaped the haunted house, the canine’s entire demeanor had changed. Had she just been… acting? You were tempted to just leave while she wasn’t looking — the door had been ripped off its hinges, after all, so it wasn’t like they locked you in — but on the other hand, this might be an opportune moment to save your friends. “H-hello?” You said, cautiously approaching the two nude anthros on the couch, readying yourself to flee at any moment.

“Oh, hey! Congrats on making it through the maze! I was rooting for ya!” The cow smiled at you, looking up from her phone momentarily.

“Yeah, really impressive. I didn’t think anyone would make it, honestly,” the bear nodded in agreement.

“Y-yeah… thanks,” you said, rubbing your arm. “So… if all that was just for fun… do you think y-you could let my friends out now?”

“We already went over this. The house was fake, but the danger was real,” the bear sighed. “Besides, fair’s fair. You get a snack ‘cause you won, we get a snack ‘cause they lost.”

“T-then I’ll call someone! The police, maybe!” You say, a little more assertive now that you knew you weren’t stuck here. “Y-you’re not just going to get away with this!”

“They can’t get to Vampyre Lane. Don’t you understand that much, yet? This neighborhood’s not a physical place,” the bear grimaced. “It only even overlaps with your world once a year. Come midnight, it’ll disappear again.”

“Disappear?” You say. “What do you mean?”

“You’ll find yourself right back wherever you started, like you were never even here,” the bear replies. “That is, if you’re not already trapped inside somebody’s gut by then.”

You stare at the ground, overcome with the revelations. “So… there’s nothing I can do?” You say, a few tears falling down and soaking into the carpet before you even noticed you were crying again.

The bear paused, not wanting to see you cry. “Alright, listen. I’ll make you a deal,” he said, finally willing to throw you a bone. “If you can find some people to replace them, and lure them into the manor, we’ll let your friends out. How’s that?”

You considered it. Could you really doom somebody to suffer such a fate? Then, you realize… the bullies! Gary and Ron! They might’ve followed you to Vampyre Lane! If you could find them, they’d make the perfect replacements for your friends! You perk up, full of hope once again. There was a chance you might be able to save your friends after all! “Y-yes! Thank you so much!” You agree, almost crying tears of joy at the simple compromise. “I-I’ll get right on it!”

“... after you enjoy your prize!” The tall canine said as she emerged into the room, carrying a huge box full of all the candy you could imagine. She dropped it curtly on the ground in front of you, and you stared at your prize in awe. Of course, you couldn’t, in all good conscious, waste time on this… but judging by the expectant look on the canine’s face, she’d be upset if you didn’t eat anything. Surely, it wouldn’t hurt to try a few...
11422121.title: You Made It!

choices: You run into the white canine that greeted you at the door!
A chubby bear!
A slutty looking, curvy fox!
11423.content:
It was a tall man that was wearing a wolf costume...or so it seems. The wolf's fur was black and despite the room being black, you could tell he was a bit muscular and was about 7 or 8 feet. He looks over at you and chuckles as he licks his muzzle.

"Hope you don't mind if I take a seat miss..."

You didn't know what he meant at first before he suddenly turns around and lifts up his tail, exposing his muscular rear and tail hole to you. Before you could slip out, the wolf suddenly sits down over you, pushing your head into his slick tail hole. His tail hole seems to be slick with lube or something as the wolf starts to pant. He then reaches down and starts to jerk himself off as he pushes back further onto you. You grunt at this and attempt to push him off. You couldn't manage to push the big lupine off as he was about 3 or 4 times your size and he was probably as strong as 2 or 3 men! He struggled to push your shoulders in at first, but he gets up for a bit to give you a bit of fresh air...before he sits back down fully and pushes your shoulders into him, causing him to let out a deep moan as he keeps jerking himself. Eventually, he would sit down until just your legs are sticking out, which he reaches down and pushes in hard, causing him to let out a loud howl as he sprays the room, along with himself, in lupine cum. He would stay in his seat and pant for a bit after shoving in his butt meal...

Eventually, he felt some grumbles and lets out a deep fart that vibrates the chair, panting as he feels the human female squirming inside of him. The wolf then grunts from the smell of his own fart and leaves the room, swaying his tail and rubbing his muscular butt cheeks over his new butt toy...

Meanwhile...


You have no idea that about your friends' fate. You have no idea that one friend became food for a bovine and another became an ass toy to a wolf...

Eventually, as you get into another room, you groan from a horrid smell, noticing someone had let a fart out before leaving the room...just before you left this room...
11423.title: Wolfman's toy

choices: Check out the park's stage
Get some more sweets
Move on
115.content:
You wanted to just hit the first houses you saw... but you decided you had to be smart about this. Your time here was limited, so you wanted to maximize the flow of candy as much as you could. You noticed some commotion coming from deeper within the neighborhood, and convinced your friends that it would be the best strategy to investigate.

As you ventured deeper, you found that the locals were actually hosting an Halloween party in the middle of the neighborhood park; open to everyone, apparently, judging by the couple dozen other trick-or-treaters loitering around. Just wandering near the party, your nose was filled with the delicious smells of freshly-baked sweets of all kinds. Apparently, this was the place to go if you were interested in treats. The Halloween decorations strung from tree to tree in the park were beautiful, too, and similarly appropriate songs were being played over the speakers. The only thing that was disconcerting was that the locals here, too, all seemed to be dressed in those weird, super-humanly tall animal costumes. You were starting to question their mental health, at this point... but their cooking was delicious, so you couldn't explain. You and your friends stopped by the park just to chow down on some of the free deserts on offer. As you chowed down on some Halloween-themed cupcakes baked by a friendly 'squirrel' lady, you use the free time to plan out your next move. You should probably get busy stopping at more houses to ensure you fill up your bags, but... the party seemed fun. Maybe you should relax, and see what there is to do around here?
115.title: Halloween Party

choices: You!
One of your friends
Some random fan
1151.content:
The possibility of collecting enough candy to last until Christmas was tempting… but really, you wanted to be able to relax and enjoy your Halloween every once in awhile. Besides, something about the park just put you in a good mood; even the normally-disconcerting animal people put you at ease, with their warm smiles and delicious, free sweets. There was just such a well-made, fun ‘spooky’ atmosphere in the park that you just wanted to soak in it for a while… and it seemed your friends agreed.

You tried to converse with some of the other trick-or-treats wandering around the park, but most of them spoke other languages completely. Strange -- you had never really met anyone in the area who couldn’t speak English, but this one little park alone had dozens of them. Besides that, all of the trick-or-treaters looked and dressed like they were from all over the globe, rather than just this general area. It was just another aspect of Vampyre Lane you were confused by… but the language barrier didn’t stop you from hanging out with the other guests. After tossing around a football with some for a while, you deduced that the stage was the aspect of the park that the visitors were most excited about. “Hey, we should check out what’s going on over there,” you point towards the stage, hearing a beautiful song being sung there, even from all the way on the other side of the park.

“Alright, coming,” Maria said, finishing the last of her cupcake as she stepped forward. Kevin joined you two silently as you walked towards the stage. He didn’t seem to like it here very much; then again, he didn’t seem to like this whole neighborhood. He was always pretty neurotic, but you hoped he didn’t end up ruining Halloween for himself.

You rushed as fast as you could, but to your disappointment, by the time you reached the stage, the performance was already over. A beautiful blue-furred feline was walking proudly offstage, the audience clearly lovestruck by her singing. You, on the other hand, had missed the whole thing. You snort in frustration, planting yourself in one of the empty seats, in the hopes that you could at least catch the next performer. Your friends sat on either side of you, and the three of you munched on sweets and discussed your plans while you waited for something interesting to happen.

Eventually, just as you were about to give up, the lights shining down on the stage dimmed and/or changed colors, signifying another of the ‘anthros’ was about to debut onstage. You perk up in anticipation, waiting to see one of the locals walk up the stage’s stairs… instead, though, to your surprise, a dazzling cloud of light and fog burst onstage, slowly clearing to reveal the next performer standing before the crowd. She seemed to be dressed as a bat of some sort, with silk like purple fur complementing her long, orange robe. Though it took the liberty of showing off as much of her cleavage as possible, the robe still lent the voluptuous bat the most modesty of any of the anthros you’d seen so far, so that was a plus. Completing her witch outfit was a big orange hat and a mystical-looking wooden staff, which she waved around whenever she wanted to perform feats of ‘magic’. “Welcome, visitors, to Serafine’s Study of the Uncanny!” She greeted the audience in a loud, booming voice, as she took a bow. “I don’t get to perform for humans very often, so this is quite exciting!”

Humans? You raised a brow, confused. Wasn’t she a human? Maybe this was part of the show. “Yes, I am the sorceress Serafine. Some of you may have heard of me. For those that haven’t, I am simply a humble teacher, here to open your minds to the wonderful and the uncanny,” She stood, walking around the stage, as purple and orange fog collected around her feet. She paused suddenly, pointing her long staff at the crowd. “But first, I will require a volunteer. A little assistant, if I may.” Immediately, about a dozen hands shot up; and seeing the excitement on the volunteer’s faces, you reluctantly raised your hand as well, curious to see what all the hubbub was about. She smirked as she looked over the crowd, sizing up the possible volunteers according to some unknown criteria. Eventually, she picks...
1151.title: Serafine’s Study of the Uncanny

choices: ...a curtain with a fork and knife emblem on it
...one of those boxes magicians would cut through, a heart emblem on it
...those splitable boxes with a skunk emblem on it
11511.content:
Eenie, meenie, minie... moe!" Serafine said before pointing at you. With that, the crowd began cheering, eagerly anticipating the show. You were till weirded out by the circumstances. Now that everyone's anticipating a show, you couldn't simply ignore her. You swallowed your fear down, and got up. Maris and Kevin gave you thumbs-ups. They clearly had faith in you, so maybe you'd be safe. You stepped forward, the crowd cheering you on. Serafine, meanwhile, lowered a hand down to you, inviting you onto the stage.

"Hello little guy!" she said as she lifted you up. "You're new to Vampyre Lane, aren't you?"

"Y-yeah," you sheepishly answered.

"Oh hun, no one's gonna hear you with that tone. Now, tell the crowd, are you new to Vampyre Lane?" As she spoke, you scanned her body curiously. Getting the face to move in addition to such realistic fur? Why would someone dedicate so much time to a costume? And why is it so shapely?

"Y-yeah!" you declared.

"Aw, we got a newbie here, Vampyre residents!" Serafine declared. "Newbies were always a favorite of mine. I missed seeing genuine surprise at my tricks!" As she spoke, she kept getting uncomfortably close to you. She wrapped a free arm around you and held you close to her thigh, forcing her cheek against her hip. You didn't realize it on first viewing, but her robe was shockingly thin. If you didn't see or feel the fabric, you'd swear she was wearing nothing. "How many magic shows have you been too, precious?"

"None!" you answered.

"None?! You haven't seen magic before?!" she asked. You could tell she was playing it up. You always heard how magicians were meant to make a show, and this lady was definitely living up to expectations in that regard. "Well why don't we solve that? Though, I must warn you, when I perform, all other shows will pale in comparison."

"Whatever, bring on the show!" you answered. The crowd cheered, and Serafine's grin grew. She snapped her fingers, and you heard a oft "POMF" behind you. You looked behind you, and saw a cloud of smoke, slowly dissipating. Beneath the thick cloud, you saw...
11511.title: You!

choices: Author's Choice
Author's Choice
115111.content:
You cover your eyes as smoke seems to erupt from the floor… only to see a ornate curtain standing before you when the fog cleared. It appeared to be simply designed to hide something away from the audience. It's only odd feature was the golden symbol embedded into the fabric; a fork and knife over a plate. “You lucky devils all get to see my special Halloween show! I only get to do these sorts of tricks once a year!” She announces, trying to hype up the crowd as you inspect the new feature on the stage. “In keeping with the theme, I can take care of the tricks, and my adorable volunteer here can be the treat!” She said, bending over slightly to pinch you on the cheek. Her cleavage hovering inches away from your face isn’t enough to distract you from what she just said.

Ordinarily, you’d figure she was using the word ‘treat’ to mean, like, a pleasant surprise or something. However, the odd emblems on the curtains gave you some other ideas. “... uh… like a literal treat, or…?”

“Shhh…” She put a finger to your lips for a moment, before turning to the crowd once again. “These curtains aren’t connected in any way! As you can tell, this stage has no trap doors, no secret mechanisms, no tricks! In fact, why don’t I give you all a peek behind the curtain, as it were?” She pushes the curtains aside for a moment, giving the audience a good look of what was behind them, before moving them back to their proper places. Adjusting her robe, she continued. “My treat shall take his place behind this curtain, and I shall perform an incantation! What happens next can only be explained by the supernatural!” You didn’t like being called a ‘treat’, but not wanting to embarrass yourself in front of everyone, you follow her instructions.

She leads you behind the big, fancy red curtain. You were a little panicked; she hadn’t told you if you were supposed to be doing anything, or even what the ‘trick’ was going to be. Seeing you were nervous, she gave you a smile and a wink, as if to say, ‘don't worry, I’ll handle this’. Weirdly, that actually managed to calm you down slightly.

When you were well-hidden from the ground, the bat took her place, adjusted her robe, and raised her large staff. “Soth dolibix hakon!” She chanted, in a big, booming voice that echoed throughout the entire part. She waved her staff around rhythmically, her eyes clenched shut in concentration. Fog began to run across the floor of the stage, with no discernable source. You were starting to grow nervous. “Suh utzilah korilath!” You, and only you, could start to feel a faint rumbling in the distance, as if there was some sort of earthquake. The audience was giggling at the theatrics, but you were frozen with fear. You were starting to believe the bat woman actually had some sort of power. As she chanted, everything began to grow dark, and you felt like there was some kind of energy building up inside you. “Vimi tagopar vigis!”

Her incantation finally reached its crescendo. With one big, dramatic wave of her staff, there was a burst of smoke from behind the curtain, as well as the faint sound of confetti. The audience sat there in silence, curious to see what had happened to the volunteer. The bat was notably exhausted by the spell, but kept the show going undeterred. “Oh dear! It seems my volunteer has decided to just disappear on me!” She feigns surprise for comedic effect as she approached the curtain. She pushes the entire curtain over onto its side, to reveal that sure enough, you were gone! There was nowhere you could’ve disappeared to during the performance. You had just disappeared from existence!

The audience giggled at the reveal, trying to figure out what the ‘trick’ was. Even Kevin and Maria were entertained by the performance, certain that you were fine somehow. “How rude of him! Doesn’t he know everybody deserves a Halloween treat?” Serafine turned back to the crowd, gesturing with an arm expressively, pretending to be offended for comedic effect. “Looks like I better go find him, then!” She lays one of her paws on edge of a foot of the overturned curtain, pulling it back up with her weight alone. With that, she ducked down and tiptoed behind the curtain, disappearing from sight as well for only an instant. The setup had gone well, but the punchline was yet to come.

When she emerged seamlessly out from behind the curtain, there was suddenly something obviously different about her. There was a big bulge in her robe now, as if she was somehow sneaking a large beach ball beneath her robe. “Ah! Well, there he is!” She said, lifting up her robe (she was wearing strange black lingerie beneath, of course, although that’s better than nothing) to reveal that her once skinny, furry belly had now expanded to the size of… well, you! At first, she simply looked full, but as she showed off her stomach to the crowd, the audience could easily see the bulges and outlines coming from within, confirming that you were, somehow, stuck in there.

“So that’s where you went, you little rascal! Wanted to curl up in ol’ Serafine’s belly that bad, huh? Couldn’t even wait til the end of the show,” she teased you for the entertainment of the crowd, rubbing and jiggling her distended gut. The audience laughed and cheered upon seeing your fate, but your friends were silent, their faces flush. That couldn’t be… real, could it? Nobody else was freaking out about it, so it couldn’t be real. This had to be some sort of illusion. While Maria and Kevin stayed in their seats, they were less interested in the show now, and more wanting to see if you were okay.

At the moment, you definitely wouldn’t call yourself ‘okay’. It was disorienting to simply fade from existence for a moment, but it was even moreso to come back and find yourself curled up in someone’s stomach. You couldn’t even tell where you were, at first… but with the constant sound of the bat’s heartbeat just above you, as well as the churning and gurgling of her gut, it didn’t take long for you to put two and two together. Luckily, it wasn’t as bad in there as it could be. There was quite a bit of light and air in there, somehow, and there didn’t seem to be an acid or anything. Only problem was that it was tight. You were forced into the fetal position by the cramped confines, and every single time you tried to stretch out and get some wriggle room, you only succeeded in making more visible bulges in the bat’s gut, for the audience’s amusement.

“Well, that’s okay! I’ve got some magic tricks you can take part in from right where you are!” You could hear the bat’s voice clearly, perhaps even better than before, though it didn’t seem she could hear yours. Either that, or she was simply ignoring your constant screams of ‘what is wrong with you’ and ‘let me out of here’. It seemed she was continuing her stage show, but at this point, you were ignoring here, focusing only on figuring out your situation. What had just happened to you? You had just… blinked out of existence for a moment, and when you returned, you were here. Is this some kind of fake stomach… part of her costume, maybe? Why would her costume contain a fake stomach capable of fitting an entire person inside? You hadn’t the foggiest idea; all you knew is that you wanted out. There had to be some kind of zipper or something…

Eating that random boy was just the first act in her show. This was the only time in the year she got to perform for those cute, bite-sized humans, and she tried to take advantage of every opportunity that comes with that territory, including the chance to have a big, bulging belly throughout her entire show. Finally done rubbing her gut for now, Serafine stretched for a moment as she got ready for the next trick...
115111.title: Disappearing Act

choices: Peek in through the windows
Sneak in the back door
Walk in the front door
1152.content:
There was something… addicting about the fresh-baked sweets that squirrel lady was cooking. You really hadn’t had anything like them before; even the expensive candy provided at all the houses around here couldn’t compare. You had to have more. Without a word being exchanged between you, you and your friends all agreed, and you rushed back to the counter for a second filling. The pudgy squirrel woman smiled as she saw you returning; she was dressed in what looked like a moderately revealing chef costume, hat and all. Even the smells of her baking were intoxicating to your nostrils as you grew closer. She gestured happily to her supply; she seemed to have an endless array of treats to choose from. “Are you sure I can just…?” You say, looking over the delicious treats in awe.

“Oh, sure, sugar! Eat as many as you like!” The squirrel nodded, and you and your friends eagerly reached for more. “There’s more than enough for everyone!” You chowed down on yet another delicious chocolatey treat… and then another… and then another. You and your friends were grabbing cookies, cupcakes, muffins, all sorts of pastries with reckless abandon, scarfing them down with greater and greater vigor as you lost track of time. Even when your bellies were visibly rounded by the sweets, you still didn’t feel remotely full. As you took a moment to look around, you realized about a dozen other trick-or-treaters were gulping down treats with similar fervor. It was like the pastries were having some sort of… magical effect on you. The squirrel looked on with a smile on her face all the while, encouraging you all with a mixture of approval and amusement.

After about an hour of constant, fervent snacking, the three of you finally convinced yourselves to take a break, out of sheer exhaustion. Your round bellies now distended a full feet or two out the front of your bodies, and yet, you still didn’t feel quite full. If you didn’t know any better, you would assume the tall squirrel lady was just trying to fatten you up for some devious purpose… but that would be ridiculous. Besides, you were way too tired to think about such things right now. You felt about ready to slip into a food coma at any minute. Just as you were about to doze off, you saw the tiger from before walk up to the country, pushing an entire cart full of fresh-baked pastries. “Sorry this took so long!
