I got a little… sidetracked,” the tiger said, wiping some sweat from her forehead as she began to stock the pastries into the shelves of the squirrel’s stand.

Eventually, the tiger’s face went pale when she noticed Maria sitting there, staring at her incredulously. “Hey! Where’s Hugo?” Maria complained, crossing her arms in anger. “Didn’t you say he shouldn’t be left alone?”

“Oh! Y-your… uh… brother is still… back at the house,” the tiger said, her tone making it obvious she was trying to come up with a lie. “I left him with… my neighbor! Yes! I convinced one of my neighbors to supervise him while I brought these pastries here!” While Maria interrogated the tiger, you were too busy staring at the feline costumer’s belly, which she was rubbing over with one of her ‘paws’, as if trying to placate someone inside. Her stomach looked slightly bigger than it was when you last saw her, though you couldn’t tell if you were just misremembering things. “Wouldn’t want him getting hurt, would we? He’s such a cute little human… and such a good assistant, too!” Just as she says that, you could swear you saw a small handprint press against the side of her furry ‘belly’ for a split second. Of course, that was impossible — she was just wearing a costume, right? You must just be seeing things.

Maria obviously wasn’t satisfied with the tiger’s answer, but before she could ask any further questions, the tiger scampered off, as if busy. The three of you were far too busy to follow her; you were more preoccupied scaring down a few dozen more pastries, trying to get to them before the other trick-or-treaters could. With a dozen rabid hands tearing apart the supply, the squirrel finally ran out. “Oh, dear! It seems you were all even more ravenous than I expected!” She giggled, seeing the desperate looks on your faces. “Well, seems like I’m going to have to wrap things up here. But if y’all are interested, I’ll be offering more pastries at another party across the neighborhood, if you want to stop by…”

It wasn’t even a question. You were all hopelessly addicted to the delicious treats at this point. Thus, when the squirrel wrapped things up and moved on to the next event, she had a big line of fattened trick-or-treaters following along behind her like the pied piper, letting them blindly follow her to wherever she wanted them to go…

┄┄┄


As you walked, the taste of the sweets stopped clouding your mind, and you were able to think about the situation semi-rationally. There were a few things that put you off about all this. The handprint in the tiger’s belly, the way the squirrel seemed to be fattening you all up, the sheer realism of their costumes, the way the other trick-or-treaters seemed to have come from all over the world… it all led you to one grim conclusion; this whole thing was a trap. It was a ridiculous conclusion, of course, and by all evidence, it should be impossible. Still, you couldn’t shake the suspicion out of your mind. “Here we are! Just up ahead,” She smiled, pointing to a house up ahead. It seemed to be one of the biggest houses on the block, and packed with locals in those strange, huge animal costumes.

As you approached, your suspicions grew to the point that they were unbearable. Eventually, you couldn’t help yourself but to grab the arms of your friends. “Hey! Over here,” you said, whispering, as you pulled them into one of the nearby bushes, knocking them out of their trance. “Over here! Hide!”

Since you were at the back of the line, the three of you were able to disappear into the bushes easily. Your friends looked at you wish confusion as the rest of the trick-or-treaters were led into the house. “W-what?” Kevin asked. “What are we hiding for?”

“I don’t think we should just walk in there,” you whisper. “I think the locals are… planning something.”

“What? That’s ridiculous,” Maria raises a brow, as if surprised you would even suggest such a thing.

“Yeah!” Kevin agreed. “And did you taste their cooking? I’m not about to pass that up!”

“Well, there’s no harm in checking things out first, right?” You insist. “Just trust me on this; waltzing in through a stranger’s front door is a bad idea. We should scout this whole thing out first. If it’s safe, we can still get some treats.” Your friends were frustrated, thinking you were just wasting their time, but they knew they couldn’t argue. They begrudgingly followed you as you as you approached the house, hiding under the cover of darkness...
1152.title: Too Much Chocolate!

choices: You make it
You're spotted!
11521.content:
“I don’t know why you trust these people so much. They’re strangers! Weird, rich eccentric strangers…” You complained as the three of you creeped up around the left side of the house  , approaching the closest window.

“What are you so afraid of?” Maria whispered as she followed along behind you, in that familiar, frustrated tone of voice she has whenever somebody does something stupid. “What’s the worst that could happen?”

“... maybe they’ll try to eat us?”

She stops in place, staring at you wide-eyed, as if unsure of whether or not you were serious. “... okay, now you’re just being ridiculous.”

All the weird eccentricities of the citizens of Vampyre Lane all lead you to the same conclusion. You almost didn’t want to believe it was true, but when you really considered the coincidences; the myths of disappearances, the inhuman heights and impossibly realistic costumes, the way those addicting muffins fattened you up, the bulge in that tiger’s belly… you couldn’t help but put two and two together. “Maria! Haven’t you heard the rumors?” You admit. “I… think they might be true. This whole thing just doesn’t add up.” You hear her groan behind you, obviously frustrated. It seemed neither of your friends particularly believed you.

“So we’re just going to peek into their windows?” Kevin whispered in a concerned tone, always nervous about breaking the rules.

“They invited us inside, so this should be fine, too,” you insisted, trying to get them to stop interrupting you as you finally peeked inside the window. “Now just humor me for a second, okay?” You peek inside, only to see a modest bedroom within. Despite the fact that it was empty, the lights were on and the door was open, so it was obviously open to anyone during the party. Your naive, innocent mind had no clue what anyone would possibly be doing in a bedroom during a party. Sleep? Impossible with the music playing. Monster Mash was blaring loudly on the living room speakers, of course; a goofy sort of song that made you start to realize you were just being ridiculous. Soon, though, you started hearing some other noises, just barely buried by the roaring of the music.

“... I’m not seeing anything,” Kevin said obliviously as you sprained your ears.

“Sshh…” You shushed him harshly with a finger, before gesturing for the two of them to listen. Eventually, the current song ended, and in the break between songs, you could hear the sound more clearly. You could hear the trick or treaters inside yelling and shouting, as if terrified of something. You could even hear furniture being flipped over and dishes being smashed, as if there was some kind of struggle going on inside. Before you could really tell what was going on, though, another song started playing, muffling the noise once again. The three of you stared at eachother, wide-eyed, trying to interpret what you just heard. You suddenly felt a weird chill, and when you looked down, you realized you had goosebumps.

“... was that…” Kevin asked softly, looking horrified. “... screaming?”

“Maybe somebody just jumped out and scared them,” Maria said, trying to come up with a rational explanation, although you could tell she was also rattled by what you’d just heard. “It is Halloween, after all.”

“I don’t know, this is creepy,” Kevin whimpered. “Maybe we should just leave.”

“Not until I’m sure they’re all okay,” you said, before continuing to sneak around the house, “now come on.” Maria and Kevin looked at eachother nervously, before ultimately following you once again, trying much harder to be quiet this time. You check every window you come across, but they all just reveal empty rooms; you’d probably have to wander all the way around the house before you can get a good view of the living room. Eventually, you snuck around to the back yard, where the big, wooden back porch overlooked a creepily dark forest. Just as you were sneaking through the yard, you heard the back door creak open, and you immediately ducked into some bushes. “Shh! Shh!” You insisted, though your friends had no plans of making a peep.

You heard big, heavy footsteps crossing the back porch — obviously one of the locals. You peek out of the bushes to see another inhumanly tall, voluptuous young woman in a grey wolf ‘costume’, who seemed to be dressed up as a pumpkin. Well, saying dressed up wouldn’t be accurate; she was almost naked, and the only thing she had as far as costume’s go was the fact that the fur on her belly was dyed orange and black to resemble a jack o’ lantern. Considering how big and round her belly was, for some reason, the jack o’ lantern dye was actually pretty convincing. She let's out a burp as she emerges from the house, looking dizzy and uncomfortable as she limped over to a bench.

“Just need a little… fresh air…” She pants, weighed down severely by her stomach. The rest of her body was very skinny, so her big belly couldn’t be blamed on her weight or anything. She obviously wasn’t used to having such a big, round stomach, so she couldn’t be pregnant; she had to have eaten something. “Urgh… I’m gonna get indigestion…” She let out a little huff of relief as she finally sat down on the chair, rubbing over her sore stomach with discomfort. Eventually, she leaned back in her chair, closing her eyes as she struggled to digest whatever she had eaten. Still, you couldn’t prove she had eaten anybody. It’s not like you could see any bulges coming from within, it was just… big and round.

Still, you were determined to get to the bottom of this. You wanted to be sure these… weird animal costumers were actually eating people before you called the police or something. Seeing that she had her eyes closed, you went prone and tried crawling you way past the porch, determined to get a view of the dining room. “What are you doing? Are you crazy?” Kevin whispered frantically, seeing you crawling away.

“I’m gonna scout things out,” you whisper back. “Stay here for now.” Kevin obviously thought this was a terrible idea, but it was too late to protest now without the ‘wolf’ hearing, so he just held his breath and hoped you made it…
11521.title: Suspicious Activity...

choices: ... use their phone
... use their car
115211.content:
The wolf was so preoccupied, you were able to evade her notice easily as you crawled by the porch. The closer you snuck towards the farthest side of the house, the more disconcerting noises you heard, and your heart was beating in your chest as you approached one of the windows. When you looked inside, you could only stare, frozen, at the unimaginable display before you. Through the huge, vertical windows along the wall, you could easily see the entirety of the living room, dining room, and the great room, and saw that the huge house was packed with over half a dozen anthros. It would almost look like your average house party, if it wasn’t for the fact that every patron was completely naked, and lounged around with huge, rounded guts.

Your eyes fell on a curvaceous bird woman who wandered by the window, with wide hips, big beautiful wings instead of arms, and most prominently, a huge, bulging gut. As she past you, oblivious to your presence, you saw a handprint bulge against her big, rounded stomach. You shuddered in shock and awe. There was no doubt in your mind; these ‘anthros’ were real, and they were eating people! Even more incredible, those people were still alive inside their rounded bellies; you shuddered to imagine the fate these anthros had in mind for them.

Eventually, the bird woman walked up to the kitchen, where you realized the squirrel woman you saw earlier was standing. She looked pleased with her handiwork, though her belly wasn’t as large as the other’s, for some reason. “My compliments to the chef. Really, such an incredible feast to cap the evening off once again, April,” the avian complimented. “Such a shame there wasn’t enough for everybody.”

“Yeah. I don’t know what happened, Alona. Three of ‘em just disappeared while we were walking here. Must’ve wandered off,” the squirrel shrugs, distracted as she cooked up more conventional meals. “Oh well. The night’s still young. Sheryl’s rounding up some more humans as we speak, in fact.”

“Mm…” The bird woman licked her ‘lips’ and rubbed over her already engorged belly. “Can’t wait for dessert, then.” Disgust and indignation brewed inside you. After swallowing an entire person, she was still hungry for more? Do these animals have no remorse? You look away in disgust, scanning the rest of the party to see how the rest of the patrons were handling things. They all seemed equally sadistic, rubbing over the bulges in their guts as the people inside futilely kicked and punched. Eventually, you noticed a blue-furred canine woman who didn’t seem to have anyone in her stomach… though she, of course wasn’t guiltless either.

“They’re both really wriggling in there, Jazz!” The canine smiled. She was on her knees in front of a bulky, muscular jackal woman who was sitting on the couch, and was diligently rubbing the jackal’s belly, blushing and smiling brightly as she admired the bulges coming from within. The jackal woman’s belly was huge even by the standards of the party-goers; the gluttonous woman must’ve wolfed down two people. “To be honest, I didn’t believe you at first when you said you’d be able to fit that man up your, uh, other end…”

“Yup. Been practicing for a while…” The jackal said, leaning back and smiling with her eyes closed as she passively enjoyed the enthusiastic belly massage she was receiving. “Thanks for letting me have your snack, babe.”

“Pleasure’s all mine! I love it when your belly’s all huge like this!” The canine replied. “Besides, we can still catch more, right? Maybe I can even try out your ‘technique’...”

“I like the way you think, Reina…” Excited by the thought, the jackal suddenly pulled the canine up and onto her belly, locking lips with her before she could react. Reina seemed surprised for a moment, before melted into the jackal’s arms, using her huge belly as a makeshift water bed as the two kissed. This only caused the jackal’s belly to bulge even more as the two people inside were slowly squished beneath the canine’s weight. When the jackal started passionately groping the other canine’s ass, you were forced to turn away in disgust, deciding you’ve seen enough of that macabre make-out sesh.

Just at around the same time, the wolf finally stumbled back into the house, looking a little bit better, but still nauseous. “Whatssa matter, Violet? Bit off more then you can chew?” Another wolf, this one male with brown fur, wrapped his arm around the woman’s shoulder, helping her stay standing. His belly seemed to be just as full as hers, although he had no problem carrying the extra weight. Apparently, he was much more experienced.

“I’ve just… never done this before…” Violet said. As if to demonstrate her point, the person inside kicked roughly against her stomach, and Violet instinctively pressed her hand against her mouth, suppressing the urge to throw up. Once the feeling passed, she sighed and leaned against the wolf for support as he led her to a chair. “Ugh… I wish he’d just stop wriggling…”

“Really? The wriggling is, like, the best part,” he chuckled as he held her hand, helping her balance as she sat down on one of the chairs and got settled in. The chair creaked under her weight, but held firm. They seemed to be designed for this sort of thing. “Well, whatever. You’ll get used to it.”

“Trent… think you could… help me digest?” The she-wolf looked up at him, pleadingly.

He paused, before chuckling. “... how could I say no to that face?” He took a knee in front of her chair, and started gently massaging her sensitive belly in just the right ways to suppress the wriggling from within. He was apparently an expert at this, too, and the wolfess immediately seemed relaxed, leaning back in relief.

“Mm… ooh… that’s the spot…” She smiled, her tail wagging behind her.

You wanted to avert your eyes from the terrible display in front of you, but you wanted to memorize everyone responsible her so you could report them accurately after this. You didn’t want any of these monsters to get away with this. Still, this grotesque ‘party’ was getting harder and harder to watch with every passing moment. You looked to the far corner of the room, seeing that two anthro women — another bird, and a panther — were belly dancing in the open, while an otter sitting on the couch records them. Neither of them were particularly decent dancers, though the show was obviously designed for titillation rather than to show off their skills. “Damn, Rosey, you got moves!” The bird said, obviously exhausted. “I just can’t keep up…!”

“Just follow my lead, Dorothy. You’re a natural,” the panther replied. “Heh. Are they enjoying the show, Vince?”

The otter gave a lazy thumbs up, fiddling with his laptop while balancing his camera with the other. “You betcha,” the otter smiled. “We’re almost up to eight hundred viewers. We’re the most popular stream broadcasting from Vampyre Lane right now.” They were… livestreaming this? Hundreds of people were watching this? Not only that, but there were other streams just like this occurring all around the neighborhood? The pit in your stomach only grew worse. You weren’t just watching one crazy house party… you were getting to the heart of an entire conspiracy! You can’t imagine how many people have already been sacrificed to these vile creature’s gluttonous guts. You weren’t going to rest until every single person on Vampyre Lane saw justice for their crimes.

You finally stumbled away from the window, unable to handle what you were seeing any longer. You couldn’t just stand by and watch anymore… you had to act! You stumbled, dazed, across the backyard towards your friends, your mind fried as it tries to register what you’ve just seen. They seemed relieved to see you return unharmed, but frowned when they saw the look on your face. “Uh… are you okay, man?” Maria asked.

“It’s… it’s true…” You said, so quiet that it was almost a whisper. “They’re… eating people…” Before they could press you for an explanation, you started to cry into your hands, overcome by emotions. Kevin seemed too shocked to move, but Maria placed a comforting hand on your shoulder, letting you lean against the wall of the house as the three of you hide in the bushes again. There, through your sobs, you tell them all about what you saw inside your house. It almost needed to be seen to be believed, but by the way you were acting, they could tell you were serious.

“So… what do you want us to do?” Maria asked when you finally finished your explanation. The second you asked that question, a plan appeared in your mind. Somehow, you knew you had to sneak in and...
115211.title: The Halloween Party!

choices: Hop out the window!
Hide under the bed!
1152111.content:
You look up at them, your eyes still watering, but your mind made up. “We have to… call the police…”

“... and tell them what? Animal/human hybrids are swallowing people over here?” Maria said, still a little incredulous.

“Tell them whatever they want to hear. When they come here, they’ll see the truth for themselves,” you said, walking around the side of the house again, “now come on.” From your tone, it was obvious they had no say in this matter, and the two reluctantly followed you around the house again. None of you had your own phones, but you were somehow certain you could find a phone somewhere in that abandoned bedroom. Sure enough, whoever owned this place kept a corded telephone by their bed. Your friends were shocked to see you pull open the window, which, luckily, was unlocked.

“D-don’t go in there!” Kevin insisted. “We can use someone else’s phone!”

“There’s no time,” you said, thinking of all the people who were currently digesting. “Besides, we can’t trust anyone in this neighborhood. Just wait here, alright?” You ignored all their further protests as you snuck one foot through the window, and then the other, sliding through without making a sound. All your fears and inhibitions had slipped away, replaced with one, singular purpose; saving those innocent people. You felt a chill as you entered the room, and remembered that the door was still wide open; you tried to hide behind the bed, to make sure you weren’t spotted by anyone walking by. You fearlessly sneak your way over to the phone, expertly avoiding making a single sound.

This model of phone was before your time, so you weren’t exactly certain how it worked; you simply pressed the receiver against your ear and dialed 9-1-1. It took a surprisingly long time for the call to go through, but eventually you heard the relieving voice of a dispatcher. “911, what’s the nature of your emergency?” The monotone, female voice on the other end replied.

“I-I’m in Vampyre Lane,” you whimpered. Only once you heard the sound of your own voice did you fully realize how scared and desperate you were feeling. “Everyone here is… crazy. They’re trying to eat- I mean, kill people at this Halloween part I’m at. You h-have to hurry!”

“Mhmm. I see. Where is this occuring exactly?”

You glance out the window, pausing for a moment. “... 104 Maple Street.”

“Alright, alright, I’ll be there in 5,” the voice replied, crossing the line from ‘monotone’ to ‘lazy and indifferent’.

You were filled with relief for a moment… until you noticed what she said. That… doesn’t make any sense. Wasn’t she a dispatcher? Besides, you also realized that she had had a wholly unprofessional tone throughout this entire call, as if your calling was an inconvenience to her. “... wait, what do you mean you’ll be here?” You ask, confused.

“Just stay where you are, sir,” the voice sighed in exasperation. “I’ll be right with you.”

“No! What? Stay on the line!” You demand, only to hear her hanging up in response. “Damn it!” You smash the receiver down too in response, overcome by rage for a moment. You stood there, seething with rage, taken aback by that dispatcher’s complete lack of professional conduct. Before you could try again, however, you heard heavy footsteps slowly approaching the bedroom, and your heart sunk in your chest. They must’ve heard you! You only had a couple seconds to make your escape, and your flight or fight instinct instantly kicked in. As you saw it, you had two options; hide beneath the bed, or jump out the window. If you hid under the bed, you probably wouldn’t be seen right away… but if you did get caught, there was no way you’d be able to escape. If you jump out the window, they’d definitely see you, but you may be able to run off before they can catch you.
1152111.title: Sneaking In

choices: Wait for the cops to show up
Save your friends yourself!
11521111.content:
You first idea was to hide under the bed… but you’ve watched enough horror movies to know that that strategy never works! In those corny Halloween movies, you always figured the victims would have better chances outside of any buildings, so they’d have less odds of getting cornered. Tonight was the night you’d put that bit of wisdom to the test, it seems, as the anthro was only a moment away. By the time the purple-feathered bird woman you saw early stomps inside, you were already halfway to the window. “Hey, you!” You heard her cry, angrily, though you didn’t bother to check over your shoulder to see if she was pursuing you. Overcome by your adrenaline rush, you simply leaped headlong through the window, landing roughly on the grass below.

You immediately pull yourself to your feet and sprint away from the house, trying to get a head start on your pursuer, determined now to end up like all the victims you saw at the party. “Run!” You scream, expecting your friends to follow you like they always have. Looking back, though, you see your friends just kneeling by the window, staring at you wide-eyed, two startled and confused to register what was happening. You could only watch in horror as two big, long wing-like arms reach out the window and snatch the two up.

“Hehe! Gotchya!” You see the bird inside smile, as she lifts your friends up into the air by the collar of their shirts.

“Noooo!” Kevin squeals as the avian drags the two of them through the window.

“Let go!” Maria shouts defiantly as she struggles, though the tall anthro’s superior strength wins out easily. The two are helpless to resist as the avian holds them up like trophies.

You stop right in your tracks, shocked by this. You had just been expecting to put yourself as risk, in a display of selfless bravery; instead, your plan backfired, and now your friends were in mortal danger. “Hey! Let go of them!” You demand, fearsomely.

“Ooh? Why don’t you come make me?” The bird woman smirks, holding up your friends triumphantly, baiting you into a trap. Despite having feigned so much bravery and bravado, you just couldn’t bring yourself to come any closer to the anthro. “No? Guess they’re dessert, then. Hehehe!” Seeing your cowardice, the bird smugly slams the window shut, locking it and sealing your friends inside that dreaded house. You stumble around as if in a daze, overcome by shock and regret. Eventually, you come to your senses enough to find a hiding spot just in case some of the anthros come out to capture you… but they all seemed too lazy to bother, content to continue having their party without you.

This was obviously a trap, of course — they were waiting for you to come to them, knowing you couldn’t resist the urge to save your friends. Fortunately, though, you had already called the police, so they’d be here to back you up any minute now. On the other hand, by the time the cops arrive, it might already be too late; your friends might’ve already been swallowed up by the monsters! Who knows if the police would even have the tools to rescue them from the anthro’s stomachs. Besides, after inadvertently getting them caught, you felt guilty and just wanted to redeem yourself.
11521111.title: That Backfired!

choices: You surrender
You keep squirming!
115211111.content:
To your eternal shame, you were too nervous to brave the horrors of the house yourself. You could only lie there, imagining what your friends must be going through right now as you wait for the cops to arrive. Each minute that ticked by felt like an hour as you waited there, until finally, a single, measly cop car pulled up to the curb just in front of the house. It wasn’t as much as you had hoped, but it was enough. The car looked little strange, and the sirens weren’t blaring as it approached, but you didn’t really know anything about cops, so you decided not to question it. At least, not until you realize the police officer was actually a titanic bear woman, barely able to fit out the door like it was a clown car.

She smiled as she approached you, munching on a donut as she stepped out onto the curb. You step back a bit, though she didn’t seem immediately hostile. Her uniform seemed to be the real article, at least, squeezing down on her curvaceous form as best it can. It was definitely the least revealing outfit you’ve seen an anthro wear. Her belly seemed quite large, but through her uniform, you couldn’t tell if there was anybody inside, or if it was just paunch from all the donuts she eats. “Well, aren’t you just the cutest human I’ve seen all night,” she said in an incredibly unprofessional manner, and you flinch as she reaches down to pinch your cheek. She didn’t seem to be taking this as seriously as you had hoped. “How may I help you?”

“Y-you’re… you’re a…” You stuttered, wide-eyed as you look up at her. This was the closest view you’ve gotten of an anthro, and she was intimidatingly huge, towering over you.

“You didn’t think they’d send a human cop, did you? Why, they’d get gulped up in a minute!” As she spoke, a million questions flew through your mind. Were there really anthropomorphic police officers? Was it really that well-known that the citizens of Vampyre Lane ate humans? If so, why hadn’t anybody already done anything about it? “Have no fear, though. I am dedicated to fairly upholding the law!”

“O-okay…” You said, rubbing your arm nervously, trying to back away so slowly she couldn’t notice. You certainly didn’t trust the bear; she didn’t act like a cop, and the possibility remained that she was just wearing a random anthro wearing a police officer halloween costume. Still, you were so close that you knew she could catch you if you ran. You’d just have to see how she reacted to your testimony. “Well… those anthros in there… they’re eating people…” You nervously point at the house.

“Is that so?” She crosses her arms, looking more amused than concerned by the revelation. “Well, who’s getting ate?”

“People from the park… they lured them to this house…” You stared at the ground, unable to bring yourself to meet her gaze. “We almost got lured, too, but then we broke free…”

“And then what happened?”

“We looked in through the windows, and saw what was happening to them…” You said. “So I snuck in, and used the phone to call you…”

“Hehe! I think I’ve heard all I needed to hear,” she giggled loudly upon hearing your confession, and your heart sunk in surprise. Why was she reacting like that? Had you revealed too much? Before you could ask, the bear reaches towards you, holding you up by her sides. She was remarkably strong for such a pudgy woman; probably a result of her size.

“W-whoa! What are you-” You cry, kicking futilely against her grip. You open your eyes moments after to find yourself staring directly into the bear’s dripping maw, gazing down her dark, cavernous throat. “Mph!” You had zero time to react before the bear reached a claw around your back and shoved you headfirst into that gluttonous, waiting maw. You yell of surprise was muffled completely by the bear’s mouth as your head and hair was instantly soaked with saliva, and your face was pressed up against her rough tongue. Just like every experience predator, she used the original moment of shock to gulp your head down before you could even bring yourself to struggle. By the time you finally started wriggling and kicking, trying to break free from the bear’s grip, she already had you down to your neck in her throat.

Your heart was beating out of your chest by this point. Your natural fight or flight instincts overwhelmed all your common sense and higher reasoning, even though both ‘fight’ and ‘flight’ were useless prospects at this point. The bear had obviously devoured tougher prey than yourself, and compared to them, you were just an easy snack. She overpowered you with such terrifying strength, struggling with all the might your body could possibly muster didn’t even manage to minorly inconvenience her. You knew what she was doing, but you couldn’t do a single thing to stop it, and that knowledge terrified you to a level you’ve never experienced before in your life. You were panicking beyond belief by the time you were plunged a quarter way into her throat.

At this point, your arms were mostly pinned against your sides, and you could kick wildly in the air, trying futilely to bash her on the nose or something, though you knew you were just wasting your energy. You were making an sizeable bulge in the bear’s throat, but your head had already disappeared behind her impressive bust, and the rest of you was soon to follow. The amount of saliva covering you was truly incredible, almost feeling like you were drowning in the natural juices of the bear’s body. Now that you were waist deep, you must look like a funny sight; just a pair of legs hanging out of the bear woman’s mouth, your kicks gradually growing weaker and weaker. With a smile, she leaned her head back and let gravity slide you down her throat at a terrifying speed, until she finally clapped her teeth shut behind your feet, sealing you away completely.

She licked her lips and rubbed her belly as you were finally pushed through a tight sphincter, being dropped unceremoniously into her roomy stomach. Through all her fat, you didn’t even leave a bulge. It was dizzyingly hot inside her belly, sweltering like a dangerously warm sauna, and the swaddling effect as her tummy swung to and fro increased your disorientation. Being inside of the woman’s stomach was an unparalleled sensory experience; not just the overwhelming feeling of being squished and swung around as she moved, but also the constant sound of her heartbeat, and the gurgling of her guts, as well as the metallic scent of acid. “Hehehe! Spying through somebody’s windows… sneaking into their house… I think somebody deserves to stay in my ‘holding cell’ tonight,” she laughed, her booming voice heard even through the thick walls of flab surrounding your prison.

Eventually, you worked up the nerve to open your eyes as well, only to realize that her stomach was surprisingly well-lit. You could clearly see the undulating pink walls, the puddle forming beneath you, and to your surprise, another boy sitting across from you. "What are you in here for?” He asked, apparently dressed as a parrot or something, though his costume has long since been ruined by the harsh conditions of the bear’s stomach.

“Nothing! I called her!” You vent angrily. “She betrayed me!”

“Oh…” He frowned. “Well, I got caught stealing candy…”

“I don’t care!” You insisted. “I just want to know what’s going to happen to us in here.”

“Uh… I don’t know. The way she talks about it, she might let us out, and she might not. She’s not really clear…” He said awkwardly. “I mean, I’ve been here for a while, and I haven’t been digested any yet, so…” Somehow, that wasn’t very comforting. You didn’t want your fate to be left in the hands of this brutish woman. The possibility remained that she was just toying with you, wanting to feel her ‘prey’ squirm over Halloween only to digest them afterwards. The other boy watched nervously as you got to work furiously punching and kicking at the walls of your ‘prison’.

All you got in return was the sound of a single, long belch from the bear. “Hey, knock it off in there! You’re givin’ me gas!” The bear cop demanded, slapping her stomach indignantly. “If you keep that up, I might have to book you on charges of resisting arrest…” The other boy looked increasingly nervous when she said that, and tried to beg you to stop; you were in the same stomach, after all, so if you piss of its owner, he gets punished too. Then against, you weren’t quite ready to back down so easily…
115211111.title: You're Under Arrest!

choices: She lets you out
You're staying with her
1152111111.content:
While you hated the idea of going down without a fight, you didn’t want your mindless bravado to end up getting you digested. With a sigh, you calmed down, giving up and letting the bear control your fate. “There you go. Glad to see cooperative citizens,” the bear chuckled, patting her belly smugly. Once that whole business was taken care of, she looked up at the house, reminded of her other responsibilities. “Might as well let this delinquent’s victims know what happened.” The bear’s huge paw banging loudly against the door — a little louder then she herself expected — and the owners were quick to take notice. Soon, the bird woman from before slid open the door, smiling warmly. Her nudity went completely unnoticed by the bear, as if this was normal.

“Oh my. Leonara?” The bird said, a little surprised to see her at their front door. “Were we being too loud?”

“Haven’t gotten any complaints about that,” she shook her head, before laughing, “your real crime is throwing a Halloween party without tellin’ me!”

“My apologies. We knew you would be busy tonight,” the bird blushes, “but I take it you came to partake in the festivities?”

“Actually, there’s just something I wanted to discuss. May I come in?”

“Why, certainly!” The bird stepped aside, and the bear graciously walked in, her ears buzzing with the sound of the cliched halloween music.

Leonara smiled, seeing anthros of all shapes and sizes scattered around the house, their bellies stuffed full with squirming meals. Most notably, a group of anthros sat on a couch, all crowding around a tiger recording a jackal and a canine in a corner of the room. As the bear moved closer, she realized the canine was bent over, her tail raised, with a pair of legs sticking out of her rear end, which kicked futilely as the dog’s ‘meal’ is slowly pushed deeper by the jackal. The canine was painting and moaning, pushed almost to the breaking point by the bombardment of sensations. “Just a little bit more, Reina! Don’t give up now!” The jackal insists, on her knees by her girlfriend’s side, helping the canine work her prey deeper and deeper.

“Over a thousand viewers, now! We’re in the top 50 vore streams worldwide!” The tiger fist pumped the air at the news, and a few whoops of celebration spread through the house. Leonara chuckled and rolled her eyes as she turned away, letting the rowdy, college-aged anthros have their fun. She sat down at a table on the other side of the room, and the bird sat down next to her.

“I just wanted to let you know that a human was sneaking around your property illegally, and even snuck into your house for some nefarious purpose,” the bear whispered.

“Yes, I am aware.” The bird nodded immediately. “We actually have his friends here, if you need to question them.”

“Really? Where are they?”

“One’s there.” She pointed to the canine, whose ‘meal’ had been reduced to a pair of feet sticking out from her rear end, before those too disappeared between her curvaceous cheeks. “And one’s there.” She pointed to the squirrel lady, who was relaxing in the kitchen, leaning comfortably against a drawer as she rubbed over a belly full of fresh, squirming prey. The bird smiled slyly, taking another sip from her drink as she turned to the bear. “Would you like us to turn them over to 'police custody'?”

“Nah, I’m sure y’all can handle them,” the bear waves a hand dismissively, before gesturing to her bulging gut. “In fact, I was wondering if you wanted the two humans I have in here. At a party like this, the more the merrier, right?” The bird considered it. Of course, Sheryl’s bringing more humans to the party at this very moment… but then again, as the bear said, the more the merrier…
1152111111.title: Captured...

choices: Rosey and Dorothy
Violet and Trent
11521111111.content:
“Fine. If you’d really allow it, we’d be happy to take them off your hands,” the bird finally nods with a shrug. “Perhaps my guests can find something fun to do with them.”

“Alright. Do you have a bathtub or something?” The bear asked, and the bird pointed her to the back room. She slipped through the hungry party crowd, eventually ending up in the bathroom connected to that guest bedroom from before. Without bothering to close the door behind her, she sticks two big, furry fingers down her throat, wriggling them around until she finally gags. Pressing this advantage, she leans over the tub and starts coughing and hacking, forcing her prey back up the way they came. Meanwhile, to you, it felt like the bear’s stomach was being turned inside out; before you knew it, the two of you were pressed through that tight sphincter again, suddenly being sent flying up the woman’s throat.

Before you knew it, the bear was violently expelled you from her mouth, the two of you landing in a puddle of saliva and other gastrointestinal juices at the bottom of the tub. You gasped for fresh air, coughing up saliva, dazed by the feeling of finally being free from the miserable confines of the woman’s stomach. When the two of you finally managed the strength to stand, the bear hanging you both towels. “Good news! You’re out on ‘bail’," she smiled, tapping her belly with a hand. “In fact, instead of having to waste the whole Halloween in here, you get to spend it partying! How does that sound?” The two of you weren’t all that enthused, but you were in the lion’s den now, and knew better then the resist and make all these anthros angry. Thus, you begrudgingly take the towels, trying to wipe all the saliva off yourselves.

Once you were halfway presentable, the bear finally paraded you in front of all the partygoers. “Got some new treats here!” The bear smiled, and every single anthro in the house turned to face you. You shuddered, feeling tiny as you’re stared at by an entire party of huge, creepy anthros. You couldn’t see your friends anyway, but the newly emerging bellies of the canine and the squirrel women gave you some idea of where they might be. You were almost on the verge of tears as you were marched through the house. Previously, they had gulped their prey up as soon as they could… but with you, they knew they had all the time in the world. Your only hope of salvation had betrayed you. There would be no escape.

In one corner, you noticed that the wolf’s bellyrub seems to have evolved into something… more. The man was now on his knees, his head buried between the she-wolf’s legs, the woman moaning and panting as she clenched her toned thighs around his head. She seemed to be shuddering and gasping with every movement of his tongue, one hand on her breast and the other hand on the back of his head, pressing the wolf’s snout into her sex. Meanwhile, both the wolves’ stomachs were big and bulging, as they worked on churning at the humans inside. You turned away immediately in disgust, although the image would remain stuck in your mind.

Meanwhile, the canine and jackal retreated, giggling, into the bedroom, eager to blow off some ‘tension’ as they gurgled up their prey. You watched, helplessly, knowing that one of your friends was somewhere within the canine’s body. How were you ever going to rescue them? You were going to be the same position soon…

At this point, your only saving grace was that most of the anthros were full, and already satisfied with their meals. However, two anthros still seemed to be interested in you and the other human. Who would end up claiming you?
11521111111.title: Center Stage

choices: See if Maria and Kevin can escape the party
See if you and the boy can escape the bear lady officer
11521111112.content:
A huge, wicked grin formed on the bird woman’s beak. Two more human snacks… and Leonara was just about to give them to her? She knew Leonara was a kind woman but this was downright saintly. Smiling and opening her beak to reply, Alona was stopped when she heard the front door open and slam shut. The bird woman and Officer Leonara peered out from the kitchen and spied a curvy fox woman dressed in revealing lingerie. She held a plastic Jack ‘O Lantern filled with candy and a slew of happy trick-or-treaters stood behind her. She happily announced in a sing-song fashion, “We’ve got more party guests.” All of the anthros and trick-or-treaters applauded as the loud Halloween Party Playlist music came booming back on.

With a sly grin, the young bird woman glared back at Leonara, nearly giggling, “I think we’ll be fine.” Leonara chuckled, “Well… enjoy your party.” The huge bear woman gestured to the trick-or-treaters who were now conversing amongst the big bellied anthros, “I’m sure you’ll enjoy them. They look quite tasty.” The bird woman giggled and nodded, “I’m sure they will be. Happy Halloween Leonara.” The bear officer chuckled as she heaved herself off the kitchen chair and started to wobble her way out, trying to avoid tripping or falling over on the small humans littering the house. Patting her stomach she gently responded, “You got that right Alona. A happy, hungry Halloween!”

After schootching her was through the party crowd she made it to the front door and went out onto the porch, shutting the door behind her. She rubbed over her squirming gut, sighing, “Oof, so full. Well, the night’s still young.” Officer Leonara could feel something rising up her gullet. She puts a paw over her muzzle before tilting her head to the cool, autumn night sky and letting out a deep, gnarly belch. BBBLLOOOORRRRPPPPP! Leonara chuckled, patting her belly, “Forgot trick-or-treaters make me gassy.” Your huge bear captress waddled back to her cop car, squeezing her way in. The car soon revved back to life as it’s headlights were switched on and Officer Leonara drove off into the cool Halloween night. Her belly pressed up against the bottom of the steering wheel. The bear woman didn’t mind one bit, but it was certainly painful for you and the other boy.

It was hard to tell in the dank darkness of the bears belly, but you thought you saw the other boy start to tear up. Then you heard him sniffle, “I wanna go home. I should’ve never come here.” You had to agree with him, and you kind of wanted to flail around and cry too, and beg for someone to come save you from this hungry bear lady. But you knew that wouldn’t yield any results and might even tempt her to digest you both. No, if you ever wanted to get out of here… see your parents again… go back to school… and live the rest of your life, you had to keep it cool. At least until you make it out of this nightmare of a neighborhood, then you could cry all you want. You started to formulate a plan as the VLPD patrol car leisurely drove away into the night.

Maria and Kevin weren’t having much of a better time either. Maria groaned in disgust and wiggled about inside the dog girl’s butt. It wasn’t as dirty in here as she expected it to be but it sure was smelly. If only there was enough room in this stinky, fleshy tunnel for her to bring her hand up to her nose to pinch it. This certainly wasn’t how she thought her Halloween was going to turn out. She just hoped her little brother Hugo was ok. Fear shoot through Maria’s veins, she left him with a tiger lady… a tiger of all things. If she was anything like these anthros she definitely was going to try to eat him. She just hopes Hugo was smart enough to run from her and run fast!

As a definitively stinky fart blows past her Maria coughs and gags into one of the fleshy walls of Reina’s butthole. Outside Reina giggled and the anthros around her chuckled, slapping her butt, “Sorry sweetie, guess I’m a little gassy.” Enraged, Maria jostled herself about in the dog woman’s butt, trying to cause as much discomfort as possible, “I can’t believe you shoved me up your butt. Let me out of here you mangy mutt!” Reina chuckled, playfully biting a claw and kicking her legs in the air as she let her human buttsnack settle inside her. Wouldn’t be long now until she ended up in the canines gut and her belly will start to go to town on digesting the little brat, “Hmm, let me think about that one… NO!” All of the anthros chuckle as Maria angrily thrashes about in the dog butt.

Kevin wasn’t fairing so well either. He lightly wiggled about as much as he could in the hot, cramped squirrel belly. Kevin whimpered, tears in his eyes, “I didn’t think it was going to end like this. I thought candy was going to end up in my belly, I didn’t I would end up IN someone's belly.” April cackled as she rubbed over her fat belly, “Believe it. You humans make for great party food. It doesn’t help that you trick-or-treaters are bite-sized either. But hey, look on the bright side, once I’m done digesting you… that means no more school!” This only made Kevin squeal and thrash about more. The squirrel giggled, slapping her gut, “Was it something I said?” As Maria wiggled about inside the hot, stinky dog butt an idea came into mind. There might just be a way out of here. It would be risky, and it may not work but… FFFRRRBBBBTTTTT! It beats being farted on by this dog lady. The anthros laugh and howl as Reina jiggles her butt, “How’d you like that one snack?” As the anthros cackled Maria decided to put her plan into action.
11521111112.title: You're staying with her

choices: Bring you out to the party for ‘fun and festivities’
You’re going to make her belly twice as big
11521112.content:
Sure you could jump out the window and get a head start… but what if they came after you? You highly doubt you could outrun an animal, I mean… running in gym class was a chore for you, and playing videogames all day with Kevin definitely didn’t give you any athletic prowess. Bed it is! You dive under the bed, hoping you won’t be noticed. Stomping down the hallway and into the seemingly vacant bedroom was the curvy pantheress Rosey. She peaked her muzzle into the room, noticing the open window. Narrowing her glowing, feline eyes she scanned the room, “Anyone in here?”

She stepped into the room and started pacing around it, looking for any intruders… after all… she doesn’t remember that window being open before. She quickly opened the closet door, “Yoohoo! If there’s any trick or treaters in here the parties still going on out there. No need to be nervous.” It would seem you had stumped the pantheress, she put her hands on her hips and huffed, rolling her eyes, “Guess it’s just my imagination.” You had done it! You outsmarted her! Now you just have to wait for her to leave, then you’ll crawl out from under the bed and then-SNIFF! SNIFF! … Oops. There’s one thing you forget about… a hungry panthers excellent sense of smell.

You start to panic and shiver under the bed. What’ll you do? There’s got to be a way out of here, you just have to-“GOTCHA!” Rosey triumphantly yells as her paw clasps around your ankle. You shriek and start kicking at her, “Stop. Leave me alone. Go away.” Rosey smugly cooed, “What’s the matter sweetie, did I scare you?” She tugs at you, grabbing your legs and pulling you out from under the bed. Even with a belly stuffed with a squirming trick-or-treater she was still agile enough to grab you and drag you about. What does Rosey have planned for you?
11521112.title: Hide under the bed!

choices: Take the hayride
Explore the farmhouse
Move on
1153.content:
You enjoyed the party for a half hour or so, chatting with locals and fellow trick-or-treaters, but eventually, you remembered you only had a limited amount of time to enjoy this halloween, and you weren’t planning on spending it all here. You’ve gotten your fair share of laughs and treats… now, where were the thrills? Halloween should be a time of good ol’ spooky fun, especially since you were alone this year, but you haven’t really done anything scary yet. Thus, you decided to ask the locals for a place that’s creepy, but not too creepy… and their answer was always Carni’s Dread Acres. It wasn’t the scariest attraction on Vampyre Lane, but it was described as one of the most entertaining, so despite your friend’s cowardly hesitations, you convinced them to go.

Vampyre Lane was a curious place. It seemed to sprawl from horizon to horizon, and yet, when you set your mind to travelling someplace, you find yourself there in seconds, no matter how far away it seemed. From the outside, it seemed like just a little gated community in the woods, but on the inside, it seemed as big as an entire city. How did you never notice this place before? Pushing those thoughts aside, you were glad to finally reach the ‘Dread Acres’. It was apparently just a farm on the outskirts of Vampyre Lane that the owner re-purposed into a haunted house every Halloween. It seemed fairly popular for how out-of-the-way it was, with a dozen trick-or-treaters lining up to be the next on the hayride, which was apparently one of the funnest attractions in the area. That was the thing you were most excited for, but the line seemed like it would take forever… maybe you could do a run through of the main farmhouse while you wait?
1153.title: Carni’s Dread Acres

choices: Check out the kissing booth
Check out the costume contest
Look elsewhere
11533.content: You decided you may as well search elsewhere to pass the time. The three of you kept looking around the place. During your search, you saw a booth with "Kisses for a dollar" written on the overhead board. Inside it, you saw, what appeared to be, a blue fox girl wearing a coat of deep, purple lipstick. She also wore a costume that resembled a nurse... well, only the nurse's coat. It seemed to cover up her bra-less chest. Additionally, you saw a building with "Costume Contest" displayed on its front.
11533.title: Move on

choices: She keeps up with the kiss, making you cringe more
You feel her lips press over yours...uh oh!
She pulls you over the counter, exposing her taint and butt!
115331.content:
With a bit of hesitation, you decided to head over to the kissing booth where the fox inside smiles over at you.

"You here for a kiss hun?" she asks in a sweet tone. You shyly pull out a dollar bill and place it over the counter just before the vixen grabs it and sticks it into a purse of sorts.

"Since you're the first customer for the night, I'm going to make this one special... She then leans over and plants a kiss on you...at first, you thought this is all there is to it...that is until you felt something push into your maw! That was when you realize she was french kissing you, causing you to frail and push against her. You accidentally push a bit against her exposed cleavage, causing her to break the kiss for a bit

"Jeez hun, it's a kissing booth, not a groping booth!" She said in a teasing manner. Unbeknownst to you, You have huge, purple smears on your face. Just before you could say something, she goes back to kissing you, pushing her vile tongue back into her maw...

This lady is starting to get a bit clingy!
115331.title: Check out the kissing booth

choices: Kevin and Maria are going to join you in her stomach
She challenges Maria and Kevin to a game
1153312.content:
The fox continues to lock lips with you. Her breath is hot and rancid smelling and you’re not a big fan of her tongue attacking yours. You try to wiggle out of her grasp but she’s too strong. You can’t budge. Even worse you feel her lips widen over your mouth and then they expand further until they’re over your face and then-… GLOMP! She pulls your head past her lips and into her mouth. She’s eating you! Outside of the vixen’s mouth, both Maria and Kevin scream in terror. Kevin, being the wimp that he is, cowered at the sight of you being eaten. Maria sprung into action as she grabbed your legs and started pulling.

Maria groaned angrily, “Let. Him. Go!” The fox wouldn’t budge, in fact she started slurping more of you in. You cry and wiggle but that does you little good in the jaws of a hungry predator. Now only your waist and your flailing legs are outside of her maw. The fox pulls her head upwards, pushing Maria off of you. With her head to the sky, the vixen let gravity do the swallowing for her. GLURK! GLORP! GLURP! BBWWWAAAUUUURRRRPPPP! With next to no effort the fox nurse slurped up your little legs like noodles and swallowed you who. You make an impressive, boy-sized bulge in her gullet before getting deposited in her gut. That’s when she releases an equally impressive belch. Trick or treaters always make her gassy.

You bulge out her belly quite a bit, her once flat stomach now a bulbous, jiggling dome. You struggle and wiggle around in her gut, screaming and protesting as much as you can. Unfortunately for you, this causes the vixen little discomfort. She grins, teasingly rubbing over her gut, “Oh yes, keep struggling. Looks like you got tricked, and you became my treat. He-he! I just love that taste of trick or treaters!” Maria stood back up and glared at the big-bellied vixen, “Let him out, now!” The fox nurse cackled, “Or what!?” Maria shrank back a bit, intimidated by the imposing fox woman as she approached her.
1153312.title: You feel her lips press over yours...uh oh!

choices: Maria guesses right
Maria guesses wrong
11533122.content:
"Come now, turn that frown upside down. Why so glum?" The fox cheerily asked. "Today is a time for parties and sweets. And nothing is sweeter than an innocent little boy."

"What... you... you ate our friend!" Kevin and Maria yelled in unison. "Give him back!"

"I'm sorry, little ones, but I'm afraid your friend here is far too tasty to just give up." The fox stood up behind her booth, showing the bulge you made off to the shivering duo. Already she was salivating at the thought of making that bulge a little bigger. But the only thing she loved more than eating sweet little kids was playing with her food. With a smile from ear to ear she sat herself back down and pulled out some cups from behind the counter of her booth.

"Tell you what, let's play a little game. If you win, I'll cough up your friend and even show you where you can find more candy than you can carry." She waited for dramatic effect, watching Kevin and Maria's eyes widen with wonder. "But... every time you guess wrong, I get to eat one of you. I think I'll start with... you." She pointed a clawed finger at Kevin, who squeaked with fear. He cowered behind Maria, who boldly faced the fox down. She'd seen this game before at the fair, she was ready. "Bring it on."

The fox produced a gleaming red bauble and placed it on the table. Next she set a cup over it. "Just keep your eye on the shiny." She said with a smirk as she lined up the three other cups. Maria watched intently as the fox began to swap the cups around. At first it was easy to follow, but the fox went faster and faster. The tapping of the cups being repositioned sped up constantly. The fox's nimble hands almost became a blur, swapping the cups around with lightning speed. When she was done the fox woman proudly presented the four cups to the two frightened children. They had to point one out, but even Maria, who'd kept a steadfast eye on things, wasn't sure anymore of her judgment.

She was reasonably confident she knew which one it was. But what if she'd been outfoxed? Kevin would be squirming in that belly in no time. And she'd still need to pick the right cup from the remaining three or she'd end up in that fox gut herself. The fox woman patted her belly contently, already imagining how big it would get with more tasty little morsels inside.

"Tick tock, I haven't got all day. Unless you want to give up and climb in yourself..."
11533122.title: She challenges Maria and Kevin to a game

choices: Follow Maria back into the neighborhood
Try to warn as many trick-or-treaters about the anthros
115331221.content:
Both Maria and Kevin were sweating bullets under the pressure. They wanted to get you out, but they didn’t want to get eaten too. Kevin whimpered, “W-w-w-what do I p-pick?” Maria looked at the cups with a worried looks, “U-um… I don’t know.” The two trick-or-treaters were too wrapped up in their game to notice the dastardly grin on the vixen’s muzzle as she teasingly rubbed her belly as you wiggled in the churning organ. Maria pointed to the center-left cup, “That one!” Worriedly, Kevin turned to Maria, “Y-you sure?” Maria silently shook her head. On the verge of tears the boy turned back to the cup and slowly lifted it, “Please, please, please. I just wanna go home now. D-don’t eat me, please!”

The vixen noisly licked and smacked her lips above poor little Kevin, cackling, “No promises kid. Now lift it up!” Kevin squeaked in fear as the fox woman’s evil grin went from smug victory to confused annoyance. The small ball wobbled a bit before silently rolling off the table and onto the earthy farm dirt. The vixen’s face twisted into an annoyed rage, “You’ve gotta be kidding me. Alright… deals a deal… I guess…” She was not pleased with the results, but she had made a deal. She bends over behind the kissing booth and starts to heave, HHHHUURRRR, GLLLLUUHHHH, BBBLLOOORRRRRPPPP! A slew of heaves, coughs and belches later and you could feel the vixen’s belly squeeze around you. You’re pushed up through the sphincter you were first squeezed through.

A boy-sized bulge started sliding up her gullet until… BBBWWAAARRRRPPPPP! With one nasty belch you come shooting out of the foxes muzzle and onto a few stacks of hay. Your costume is completely soaked through, and you smell like an animal’s belly. This was going to be hard to explain to your parents when you get home, but at least you have a shot at making it home now. You get up and quickly join your friends by their side. Maria sternly asks, “Alright you spat our friend up, now tell us how to get home.” The vixen chuckled, wiping her blue lipstick-covered lips of excess drool, “Home? That wasn’t part of the deal. I said I’d tell you where to get more candy.” Maria spoke up, “We don’t want candy, we wanna go home!” The vixen lazily pointed to a block in the distance. It was a ways through some of the fields and on a particularly far end of the neighborhood. The vixen lazily answered, “It’s over that way, they give out mountains of candy, even more than the regular residents. Now scram you brats, I’ve got more customers.” As you’re shooed away by the vixen you notice her inviting over another group of trick-or-treaters.

As you three walk out into the field you worriedly look to your friends, “So… what do we do?” Kevin asked with a hurried and panicked voice, “W-what do you mean? We’re going home, we have to get out of here.” You look around at all the other seemingly oblivious trick-or-treaters, “And we’re not going to… ya’ know… tell anyone about what just happened?” Maria’s eyes went wide, “… HUGO!” Kevin stuttered, “W-what about Hugo?” Maria was nearly in a frenzy herself, “I-if that fox lady could eat us… that means… that tiger…” Without even responding to you two, Maria twisted around and sprinted faster than anyone on your school’s track team through the field and back towards the neighborhood. Kevin turned to you, “W-what do we do now?”
115331221.title: Maria guesses right

choices: The tiger is still asleep
The tiger woke up
Hugo is sleeping in the guest room bed
1153312211.content:
Maria raced back to the tiger's house like Hugo's life depended on it. After that hungry fox lady, she did not want to have to negotiate with another hungry beast to spit out her friends. Even Hugo, annoying as he was, didn't deserve that sort of treatment. Without further incident they arrived at the tiger's doorstep, but before she rang the bell a shiver ran down Maria's spine. She turned back and looked at you and Kevin.

"Guys... do you think it's safe to knock? Surely if she sees us so soon again she might realize that we know. I don't want to be anywhere near her when that happens." You both nod in agreement. You'd already been stuffed in one belly today, and that's enough to last you a lifetime.

"So now what?" You ask, curious where Maria's smile came from.

"We've gotta be sneaky. First we need to find out if Hugo is safe. Could be that not all these animal-people are maneaters, right?" She was always an optimist, but you feared the worst had happened. You mainly hoped the tiger also hadn't bothered to chew her food. Quietly the three of you snuck into the backyard, peeping into every window along the way. All the rooms so far were empty, but the living room was coming up next. Maria peeked quickly and turned back, her face white as a sheet.

"I think I just saw her belly move." She whispered. Bravely she took another look, this time keeping her cool and taking note of the situation at hand. Again the three of you huddle together.

"Okay, the tiger's asleep, but she's got a big belly and I'm fairly certain Hugo's in it. Time to go in and save him." She said confidently. You weren't quite so eager yet. "But how? Have you got a plan?" You responded.

"We've got to make her throw up. Either we find something gross in her house and pour it in her mouth or we just all hit her in the belly real hard." Maria's plan didn't fill you with hope, but given the situation it was the best plan available. First things first though, how were you going to get in? You look around and smile. You point out the open window on the first floor and a nearby ladder. All three of you worked together better than ever before to put up the ladder without making a sound. If the tiger woke up to seeing three kids trying to break into her house, she'd eat you all. You didn't want your last moments to be stuck in a stomach with Hugo.

With barely a noise each of you gets up the ladder and through the open window into a tidy bedroom. It looked sober and uninteresting, most likely a guest room. You were inside the tiger's house now. None of you dared to even breathe, terrified to wake the tiger. She'd already eaten Hugo. Or was she just a bit pudgy before? Whatever the case, you were in now and you weren't leaving without your friend.
1153312211.title: Follow Maria back into the neighborhood

choices: Jump onto her belly
Try to feed her spoiled milk
11533122111.content:
You all nervously scan the bedroom, for nothing really in particular but to bide time. Sure, you had to get Maria’s little brother out of that tiger’s belly, but you were all scared yourselves of getting close to that hungry beast lady, let alone step into the same room as her. Kevin’s knees wobbled with fear and whispered, “I-I’m scared.” Maria nodded and replied lowly, “We all are. But we gotta do this. Come on!” The three of you slowly step out from the bedroom into the living room. You three gently step on the tiger lady’s wooden floor, hoping it wouldn’t creak. Thankfully it doesn’t.

You try to stay a few good feet away from the tigress, big cats like her have acute hearing and you assumed that would make her a pretty light sleeper. You turn to Maria, “Ok, so if we get her to barf Hugo up she’s definitely going to be wide awake. We’re going to have to get Hugo out and then run out as quickly as possible.” Maria nodded knowingly, “You’re right! What’s the best way to get him out?” You pondered, peering over at the shapely tigress sprawled out on her large couch, loudly snoring. There was another chair next to the couch the fat bellied tigress was sleeping on, perhaps you three could jump from the couch onto her belly and literally kick Hugo out of her.

You turned your sights to the fridge in the tiger lady’s kitchen. You slowly sneaked in and silently opened the door. You noticed a funky jug of green-tinted milk. You checked the expiration date: “March 5th of Last Year”. If this milk doesn’t make this overgrown kitty cat sick you don’t know what will. Maria and Kevin followed you into the kitchen. Maria put a hand on your shoulder and whispered, “What’s that?” You smiled and whisper, “Spoiled milk… REALLY spoiled milk.” Maria nodded, “Let’s use that!” Kevin quivered, “Hold on! How are we gonna get her mouth open to drink the milk?” He had a good point, you’d either have to wait for the tigress to hopefully open her mouth in her sleep or try to pry her jaws open and hope she downs enough before she comes to her senses. You retort, “W-well… what if we jump from her chair onto her belly?” Maria cocked her head, “What if that’s not enough force? We don’t weigh a lot ya’ know. Even all three of us might not be a match for a few hundred pound tiger lady.” You friends both had good points. No matter what you choose it’s ultimately a gamble. So what do you choose?
11533122111.title: The tiger is still asleep

choices: The tiger lady doesn't even wake up
The tiger lady wakes up, but doesn't hurl
Success! you get her to cough up Hugo
115331221111.content:
"I say we try the jump, all together. Just getting her to drink the rotten milk is a hazard and there's no telling if she'll drink enough of it to hurl. Let's hope it also hurts enough for her to not chase us down right after." Maria gave a weary sigh in response. "You and me both."

As silently as your costumes permitted all three of you skulked through the tiger lady's living room and onto her couch. Every time she as much as twitched in her sleep you froze. The whole experience had you sweating like you were in a sauna. If she woke up before you were in position she'd be looking at three trespassers in her house. Even if by some happy chance Hugo wasn't in her belly, she would no doubt gobble you three up as punishment. Determined not to end Halloween in a tiger's stomach you push on.

Maria and Kevin were right behind you, every bit as nervous as you. She was terrified as well, but for her little brother she would push on. He might be an annoying little pest, but she wasn't going to let him become a meal for the monsters in this street. Her nerves of steel inspired Kevin to follow along too. He could've sworn he saw those sensitive ears twitch whenever one of your costumes rustled a bit too loudly. What if she was just pretending to be asleep? You'd all be jumping almost straight down her throat. No, she couldn't fake this, she wasn't toying with him. It was just his nerves. He pushed on, seeing his friends fearlessly move forward.

The couch was large and soft, easily conquered and soon you found yourself alongside you friends standing on the side. Before you was the sleeping tiger lady, her big belly rising and sagging a little with each deep breath. This was it, the point of no return. Whether you could pull this off or not, you were about to be in a room with an angry and upset tiger woman. The same tiger woman that may have eaten one of your friends. You'd already been inside of one of these strange creatures, you were in no rush to repeat that little adventure. You hold out your hand, silently counting down. Three. Two. One.

All three of you jump in perfect unison, preparing for a heavy two-footed landing right on her belly. But is it enough?
115331221111.title: Jump onto her belly

choices: Phone the police
Feed the tiger antacid tablets to bide you time
1153312211111.content:
You jump off the top of the couch, all six of your legs collide with her belly. As soon as you make impact you start to lose balance on the jiggly mass and fall over onto the tiger’s living room floor. You three topple over onto each other but eventually get up. Not even looking back you all start to scramble away until you look behind you and see the tiger lady shifting around on the couch, turning over and lazily scratching her fat ass as she continues to sleep. Maria looked confused, “That didn’t wake her?” Kevin chimed in, a tad happy you three weren’t getting hunted down by a hungry tiger, “If she could sleep through that she’ll sleep through anything.”

With a bit of courage, Maria approaches the tiger and presses her ear to the tiger’s stomach, “Hugo? Are you in there?” Maria could feel the fat belly wiggle and could faintly hear Hugo’s voice reply, “Maria? Is that you? Let me out, I’m scared!” Maria’s face went pale for a few seconds, so her little brother really did become a tiger snack. She felt so guilty, she should’ve never left him alone with this hungry animal woman. With fear in her heart, Maria whipped around and asked, “What do we do?” You and Kevin were at a loss, looks like you three are fresh out of ideas. If you three slamming into her gut didn’t even wake her, you doubt you could do anything physical to her that could make her barf up Hugo. But… there had to be something you could do…
1153312211111.title: The tiger lady doesn't even wake up

choices: A curvy and teasing red vixen!
A very muscular and tall black wolf man!
A very chubby and smelly brown bear woman!
An intimidating looking white multi-tailed fox man....
11533122111111.content:
You decided to call the police, hoping that they would somehow convince the tiger to wake up and cough up Hugo. You dial 911 and you have somehow got through to the police.

"Hello, this is police station, what's your emergency?"
"We need an officer to come out and help out our friend!"
"What happened to your friend?"
"You probably won't believe us, but this lady who is somehow a tiger capable of walking on two legs swallowed him and she won't wake up to cough him back out!"

There was a long moment of silence before you heard the dispatch again...
"Don't worry, we will send someone over to your location...

After waiting for what feels like hours but is actually a fraction of it, the police finally show up. Unfortunately, the police were also animal people just like these crazy neighbors!

Your heart as an office comes over to you...
11533122111111.title: Phone the police!

choices: Follow Maria and Officer Vixy in the car
You and Kevin try to beat them to the town’s police station
115331221111111.content:
You definitely weren’t happy about what and who was approaching you three. Strolling out of her patrol car, instead of a human, was a voluptuous anthro fox woman. After being shoved down another fox woman’s esophagus and stewing in her belly for a bit, you’ve had your fill of vixens for a lifetime. Your blood froze and you stiffened up, on edge now. The fox had a smug grin on her muzzle and she was big, like really big. Like most of the other anthros she completely dwarfed you humans in size, she had tree-trunk thick thighs, seemingly a big wobbly butt jiggling behind her, a chubby belly and two watermelon-sized breasts. She was wearing an almost comedically skimpy police uniform, it looked less like an actual uniform and more like one of those ‘sexy’ Halloween costumes.

She teasingly giggled at you three as she stepped up to you and lazily twirled her baton, “Officer Vixy. What’s your emergency?” Before you could talk, Maria blurted out, “The tiger lady in that house ate my brother!” Vixy raised a brow and stared at Maria with a confused look, like she was insane, “Um… alright? What do you want me to do about it?” Panicked, Maria started blabbering, “W-what do you mean!? Go in there and tell her to barf my brother up!” Vixy grinned and rolled her eyes, giggling and putting her paws over her gut, laughing like she had just been told a great joke, “Oh man, ok… I think I know what’s going on.” Maria was getting fed up with this, “What do you mean? What’s going on? You’re the police! Do something! My little brother is about to get digested.”

Vixy held a paw in front of Maria’s face, “Hold on! This is your first time in Vampyre Lane isn’t it?” You three nodded up at her. The fox smirked and nodded herself, “… I could tell. Listen humans, if you haven’t noticed yet, in Vampyre Lane… you humans are, well… special… a bit of a delicacy to be exact. I mean, what can I say, you squirm down our gullets well, you’re oh-so filling, and your kind is full of healthy nutrients for us animals. To be frank, you humans are like natures perfect snack for us and-“ She stopped short when she noticed herself drooling and you three quivering in fear. She nervously giggled and scratched the back of her head, “What I’m saying is, unfortunately, it’s perfectly legal for an anthro to eat a human in these parts. There’s nothing I can do.”

Maria was not taking no for an answer, she ran up to the foxes leg and started punching her, making her thick thigh jiggle about, “You can’t do that. That’s not fair! You call yourself a police officer?” Vixy giggled as she pulled out a pair of handcuffs and speedily slapped them onto Maria, restraining her. Vixy chuckled, licking her lips, “Alright, you’re coming with me young lady.” Vixy gripped the cuffs and started dragging the struggling Maria towards the patrol car. You and Kevin run after her. You don’t make the mistake of trying to hit her or fight her and just try to talk, “Please Ms., um… Vixy. We didn’t know about any of this, we just wandered in here by accident.” The fox giggled as she opened the backdoor of the car and threw Maria in, “Come on, I wasn’t born yesterday. All of the legends say ‘humans go into Vampyre Lane… but humans don’t come out’. And don’t feed me the whole ‘we didn’t know this was Vampyre Lane’ schtick! The only way for you humans to even come here is by knowing the legend. Face it! You came here, you knew the risks, and now you’re feeling real burnt cause one of your friends got eaten and the other’s about to be.”

Geez! That was a mean way of framing it. She wasn’t technically wrong. You did hear legends around school that Vampyre Lane was a place notorious for mysterious disappearances around Halloween, but you never would’ve dreamt it was because the town was filled with man-eating, walking and talking animals. You would’ve believed it was because of aliens or witches or actual vampires before you believed that. Feeling completely defeated you looked up at the curvy vixen, “So that’s it then? This is how our Halloween ends? With our friends getting eaten?” Vixy absentmindedly picked her teeth with a claw before hearing your whimpering voice, “Hmm? I mean, I guess so. Just be happy your friend here is going to be my snack, or else you might’ve ended up on the menu.” With that, Vixy used her thunderous thighs to hip-check you onto the pavement. She quickly got in her car and sped off. Now what?
115331221111111.title: A curvy and teasing red vixen!

choices: You run right into a rear end of a huge, feral animal...
You get to the station, but the car is empty, your a little late...
You manage to beat the furry bitch there and try to get Maria back!
You manage to beat her, but you run into her hungry and lustful cop friends...
1153312211111112.content:
As you watch the police car speed off, a sudden feeling of anger starts to boil inside of you, causing you to clench your fists as you stand back up. Kevin notices this and asks if you are feeling OK. "Yeah I'm fine...just pissed off at that bitch...cop or not, I want to kick her furry ass..." Kevin then asks how are you going to get maria back and you replied "I kinda saw the station as we were walking around, if we hurry up and get there, we might be able to beat that bitch and possibly get Maria back!

However, in order to keep yourselves from being spotted further, you two decided to take the alleyways toward the police station. After a while, you have a feeling that you might be nearing the Police Station...
1153312211111112.title: you two try to beat them to the police station!!!!

choices: Grizzly Bear
Alligator
11533122111111121.content: Despite the full moon in the sky, Vampyre Lane’s back alleys prove to be fairly shrouded in darkness. You and Kevin shuffle around garbage cans, jump over short fences and tip-toe around open windows. As you maneuver around skillfully you forget to look in front of you. Big mistake! BUMP! You bump into something big, stinky and growling. You’re knocked onto the ground and hear Kevin whimper in fear as you see in the moonlight a huge, hulking animal digging its face into a trashcan. It made most of the animal people look like miniature stick-figures in comparison, and the feral grunting and snarling made you quickly realize it did not posses the same upright stature or intelligence of Vampyre Lane’s anthro residents. This was a truly huge, hungry and feral beast you were dealing with. It snapped it’s giant head out of the trashcan and snarled at you two. You were face-to-snarling-maw with a truly massive…
11533122111111121.title: You run right into a rear end of a huge, feral ...

choices: You go and investigate what all that noise is
You hear someone approaching you
11533122111111122.content:
After ducking, dodging and jogging your way through the back alleys you two finally made it to the police station. You run up to the parking lot and easily notice Officer Vixy’s car is parked and most certainly empty. She had already left and entered the police department.
