Inside the department, Vixy escorted a shivering Maria through the sterile, white halls of the department. Many hungry-looking anthros eyed her and even licked their lips at her. Vixy brought her in front of a staff kitchen filled with a bunch of bored-looking anthros, ticking the night away as the rest of the town went out and had their own voracious fun with their unwitting human snacks.

Vixy cheerfully grabbed Maria and held her up in front of all of the anthros, “Hey everyone. I know Halloween tends to be a lame holiday for us, always cooped up in the station, so how about we liven up this year with some party games? Winner gets this little Halloween snack.” The whole kitchen cheered as Maria went pale, “You can’t be serious?” Vixy giggled, “What’s the matter? Do I need to put on MY SEWPER SEWIOUS FACE!?” Meanwhile, you and Kevin tip-toed into the station. It was hauntingly quiet, although you could hear some ruckus going on deeper in the station. What happens now?
11533122111111122.title: You get to the station, but the car is empty, y...

choices: Tag and Gulp
Arm Wrestling
11533122111111123.content:
You and Kevin sprint through the dark alleyways until you make it to the police station. You also notice Officer Vixy rounding the corner and heading into the parking lot. You run up to her vehicle as it parks and bravely stick your hand out at her, “Stop! Give our friend back.” As Vixy shuts off her car and steps out she nearly bursts out laughing, “Wait? What? You followed me here? Hahahaha… what is this, some sketch-comedy show? Most trick-or-treaters would run screaming from a gal like me.” You puff out your chest and glare at her, “I’m not like most trick-or-treaters!” The fox woman narrows her eyes and shakes her head, “How have you not gotten eaten yet. Oh well, you’re friend here is my meal. You could come inside if you want and join us for a Halloween feast, but trust me… you three are NOT surviving the night.”

She opens the back door and roughly pulls Maria out, “Trust me. I’ve lived in this town my whole life and if there’s one thing Momma Vixy knows… it’s that you should just accept it. YOU’RE FOOD, OK! Like… I’m sorry and all… I really am-not really… but, humans are food to anthros, just like feral animals are food to humans. Nothing personal, you’re just lower on the food chain than us. You wouldn’t say sorry to your burger would you?” Vixy drags Maria past you two, pushing you over onto the concrete, you felt absolutely defeated until you yelled, “Wait? How about a game?” Vixy turned her head and raised a furry brow, “A game of what?” You shook your head, “Any game you like. You win, you can eat all three of us. We win, you let Maria go.” A smirk appeared on her muzzle, “Well, I always did like playing with my food before I eat it… you’re on Fox Food! How about a game of…”
11533122111111123.title: You manage to beat the furry bitch there and tr...

choices: Follow Vixy and Maria and see what’s going on at DigestU. Ave.
Follow you and Kevin as you’re dragged into the station
11533122111111124.content:
You and Kevin run as fast as your legs could carry you through the dark alleys of Vampyre Lane. Thankfully, all of your frenzied sprinting paid off because you’ve made it to the station before Vixy could pull up to the parking lot. You and Kevin walk to the front of the police station, making sure you’ll have the best view of Officer Vixy’s car when she pulls into the parking lot. You would make sure she would not enter the police station before confronting you two. As you two wait, you’re completely oblivious to the fact that the entire police station filled with anthros could easily see you two standing at the front steps of the station.

Deciding to play a little Halloween prank on you, the snickering anthros silently step out of the police station and silently form a small crowd behind you two. A shiver runs down your spine as you hear a deep, manly voice ask, “Hey little guy, who ya’ waiting for?” Still oblivious to your situation, you catch your breath and nervously chuckle, “Ah, well… our friend. She got arrested by this fox lady and we wanted to ask her to let our friend go when she gets here.” The anthro behind you chuckled, slapping a massive, weighty hand on your shoulder, “Aw, that’s really nice of you. What are friends for, am I right? But ya’ know, it’s kinda chilly out here. Wanna come inside?”

You smile and shake your head, “Sorry, we can’t there’s a bunch of anthros in there and-“ You turn your head around to see who was talking to you and your face goes bone-white almost mid-sentence. In front of you is a big, fat, grey belly, but when you look upwards you see the person talking to you was a gigantic, rhino cop, smugly grinning down at you. Accompanying him was a slew of anthros, you’d have to guess somewhere around fifty, all glaring down at you and Kevin hungrily. A hawk woman snags Kevin in her feathery hands, the rhino’s grip tightens on your shoulder as he guides you into the station. Chuckling menacing he replies, “Oh, I insist.”

Meanwhile, Vixy was driving towards the station when she heard a call on dispatch, “Vixy here, over.” A male voice came over dispatch, “We’ve got some disturbances on DigestU Ave. Apparently some more trick-or-treaters are causing a ruckus, think you can handle it.” Vixy quickly and sternly replied, “I’ve got it. No worries, over.” With that, the fox woman swiftly changed her course and started driving deeper into Vampyre Lane and farther from the gated entrance. We just have to try.” Kevin whimpered, loudly sniffling, “H-how?” Maria grinned, “I’ve got a trick up my sleeve.” Maria had no tricks up her sleeve at all, but she couldn’t run around this place in the dark with a crying Kevin, they’d be easy prey and they were slowly losing friend after friend. Now they had the insane task of not only saving her brother from the belly of a tiger, but also saving their best friend from the butt of a wolf… if they even could still save them. Maria and Kevin soon climbed out of the dumpster and surveyed the empty, and eerily quiet neighborhood. Maria started walking down the street with Kevin following her, she muttered to herself, “It’s a good thing my dad was a mechanic and an electrician. He made sure I’m good with my hands.” Kevin quivered, “What’s that supposed to mean?”
115331221111112212321.title: Still in the dumpster, the wolf has driven off

choices: She wraps the rope around his legs, tripping and binding him
The wolf spins around and darts after Maria and Kevin
115331221111112212322.content:
Maria’s eyes flutter open as she stares up at the bulbous wolf butt. They must’ve not been out for too long, she could still hear attractions and happy trick-or-treaters off in the distance. Plus, something told her the hungry wolf didn’t have the patience to sit on a dumpster and sniff out his prey for hours. Kevin slowly woke up himself. Unfortunately for the two, the wolf hadn’t stopped his gaseous onslaught. By now the fetid air in the dumpster was a distinct hazy green color, and the two trick-or-treaters could literally taste the moist wolf farts at this point. Your friends could only imagine the torment you must be enduring in his butthole. The wolf continued to sniff the air and growled, jumping off the dumpster and onto the sidewalk he snarled, “I just don’t get it. I’ve got their scent but I can’t pinpoint where they are. It’s like they coated their scent in something.”

This was their chance. The two silently creep out of the dumpster and freeze. Kevin asks quietly, “What are you doing Maria? Let’s run!” Maria shook her head, gesturing to the wolf’s fat butt, “And you’re gonna leave your best friend to become fat on a wolf’s butt?” Maria starts to slowly sneak up behind the wolf, hoping to get a jump on him as he is deep in thought, sniffing the air and trying to find them. Maria grabbed some stray rope that was leftover from hanging decorations in a nearby tree. She approached the wolf, hoping to sling the rope around his legs and trip him. But, does she succeed?
115331221111112212322.title: Still in the dumpster, but the wolf is also sti...

choices: Kevin and Maria will join you deep in his butt
Feeling a bit peckish, the wolf sends them down his gullet
115331221111112212323.content:
The two had been out for a good, long time. As they awoke, they felt the cold nipping of the October night air. The overbearing stench of the dumpster was gone, but the scent of wolf butt was still present. The two opened their eyes to see the starry night sky, was the wolf gone? PPPHHHRRRRBBBBTTTTT! Nope! Not by a long shot. The wolf had discovered Maria and Kevin a few minutes after gassing them. He certainly was a fan of hunting his food down and gobbling it up without discrimination… but that didn’t mean he was a slob, even a ravenous animal like him wouldn’t eat out of a dumpster. He pulled them out and brought them into an alleyway between two houses, the only thing lighting the dark alley was the moon and a small plastic orange light on the side of one of the houses. He also specifically wanted them awake when he eats them, the prime reason anthros like eating like prey and eating them whole is the squirms, kind of defeats the purpose when gobbling K.O.-ed snacks.

Once Maria and Kevin fully woke up from their gassy stupor they met the smug gaze of the wolf standing over them, “Sleep well?” The two screamed, scrambling to their feet in an attempt to flee, but the wolf was having none of that. He bent over and grabbed their legs, dragging them back to his footpaws. The wolf moved his paws up to each of their chests and pushed down on them, pinning the squirming trick-or-treaters to the cement ground. The wolf brought his foul-smelling, grinning, drooling muzzle down to their faces. Sticky, hot wolf saliva dripped onto their faces, “You both look SO tasty. Don’t worry, you’ll be reunited with your friend soon enough, in my stomach. Hmm, but how should I eat you two?” The wolf ponders…
115331221111112212323.title: Laid out in the alleyway, the wolf looming over...

choices: It’s past midnight, and the gate is firmly locked shut
It’s still early in the night, the gates are wide open
1153312211111122124.content:
The two huge butt cheeks barring down on you made it difficult to move much, and the copious amounts of sweat weren’t doing you any favors either. But you had to try. You wiggle yourself back and forth, getting a ton of the wolf’s sweat and stink on yourself. The wolf teasingly chuckles, enjoying your squirms, “Ah, that’s the spot! See! Isn’t this fun.” He cruelly lets out a fart that burns your nostrils. Little does the wolf know that your squirming is getting you closer and closer to escaping his ass. Eventually, after nearly exhausting yourself, you grab the outside of the wolf’s butt cheeks and wrench yourself out from the butt crack.

You worked yourself so much, you weren’t sure how much of the sweat drenching your body was yours or the wolfs. You quickly pull open the back of the wolf’s pants and pull yourself out of them. You free fall back into the bottom of the dumpster. You get a few bruises as you land. The wolf was now fully aware of your disappearance and started grunting and twisting around, “Hey, where’d you go? Get back in my ass, now!” You pull out your house key from your wallet and stab it at the wolf’s exposed butt cheek. It’s not even enough to break skin, but it does sting the wolf for sure, “YEOW!” The wolf yelps as he jumps off the dumpster. You turn to Maria and Kevin and yell, “Now!” You three speedily climb out of the dumpster and high-tail it down the street. The wolf growls as he sees you three run away.

He has a bit of trouble pulling his pants back up, but once his belt is securely tied he’s back to barreling after you three. You three run for all it’s worth, “Let’s head to the gates!” Maria shrieks, “What about Hugo?” You’re panting, blood pumping, legs pumping, “We… need to get police here, real human police. No one’s gonna help us here. We’ll bring them back here to help us.” Maria cried, “You think that’ll work?” You pause as you keep running, “I-I… I hope!” You round the corner, up the main street you walked in through… but, are the gates even open? Legend says when the clock strikes midnight in Vampyre Lane, the gates shut, blocking off the human world and Vampyre Lane for another year. So… is it past midnight or not? You sure hope it’s not, you could practically smell the wolf’s hot, garbage breath from here. Unfortunately, what you're unaware of... is anthros can pass through the gates too.
1153312211111122124.title: You somehow escape the police canine's pants

choices: He starts to mercilessly fart on you
He walks off somehwere with you three securely trapped in his buttcrack
11533122111111222.content:
The huge, toned butt cheeks completely covered the open dumpster. There was maybe a few inches of space between some of the dumpsters metallic rim and the wolf’s fat butt, but certainly not enough to slip through. And there was certainly no way to get out of the dumpster aside from getting around this buff wolf. You could hear the wolf continue to sniff the area, trying to get an exact lock on your scent. You think you might have a plan. It’ll be risky, but it beats waiting around for the wolf to figure out where you are. You quietly dig through your pockets until you find something you could use. You smile as you pull out a Spirit Catcher you had won at the school’s Halloween Carnival, and pull of some of the feathers dangling from it. You hold it up to the wolf’s butt cheeks and start to tickle them with the feathers.

The wolf starts howling in laughter, squirming and wiggling on the lid of the dumpster he was perched on. He starts to lose balance but unfortunately for you, he doesn’t fall forwards off the dumpster, but he falls backwards directly on top of you three. You three shriek in terror as the huge butt gets closer and closer until with an echoing, dull BOOM the wolf’s toned booty lands on you three. Now that you’re squeezed into his crack, you realize his butt could easily fit all three of you. Sure it’s a tight squeeze, but all three of you are firmly squished together and squeezed between the huge, toned rump cheeks off the wolf. Feeling you three wiggle and cry in his crack, the wolf snickers, “Gotcha!”
11533122111111222.title: Try to get around the buff wolfy!
