He heads off down the street, allowing you three to escape
11533122111111223.content:
You three look up at the big, toned, bulbous, buff wolf butt blocking your only chance of escape. You couldn’t do anything. The butt was completely blocking the entire lid of the dumpster, casting you three into darkness. You couldn’t tell what was worse, the smell of the dumpster or the nasty, sweaty stench of the wolf’s big ass, leaking into the dumpster. With a haunting revelation, you realize it’s getting warmer and warmer in this dumpster, the chill of the late-October night and the smell of fall air replaced with the stinky heat radiating from a ginormous wolf butt and the smell of farts and dumpster. The only thing you could hear is the rustling of leaves outside and the sound of the wolf loudly sniffing.

His head darted around, his tail wagging above you, and his ears trying to hear anything out of the ordinary. You could hear the wolf snarl in frustration, “I just don’t get it. Their scent is so strong, but they’re absolutely nowhere, and I can’t hear them either. They must’ve ducked into one of the houses on this street… it’s the only answer.” The dumpster creaks and tilts forward as the hefty wolf leaps off of it and onto the sidewalk. You all breathe a sigh of relief…
11533122111111223.title: Stay inside the dumpster and hope he doesn'...

choices: She drags you three to one of these Consumption Parties
Since you three are out past curfew she’s taking you to the station
115331221111113.content:
Your jaw drops, for some reason you were expecting a human officer. But I guess that’s bad logic considering you’re in a town populated by animal people. The uniformed one approaching you was a huge bear lady. Her arms were bigger and meatier than your entire body, her thighs were thicker than tree-trunks, her breasts were probably each the size of a full grown human adult scrunched into a curled-up ‘ball’ position, but they didn’t even come close to the bears jiggling gut that was on it’s own the size of a small car. And if her huge, hulking form wasn’t enough to leave an impression, her stench did, her B.O. was so oppressive you doubted this woman even knew what the concept of hygiene was. Her uniform, clearly two sizes too small, was stretched over her pump form. The bear woman smirked down at you three, putting her dinner-plate sized paws on her couch-sized hips, “Mwahahaha, ‘tis I, mad scientist grizzly bear extraordinaire, Officer Grizzly, Happy Halloween! … So where’s the party at?”

You three looked at her confused. Maria uttered, “W-what party?” The bear giggled, “Ya’ know… THE PARTY! Someone called in about some human’s little brother getting gobbled and I thought there was a Consumption Party near by.” Then the grizzly woman put two and two together and grinned evilly, “Was it one of your siblings?” Maria stepped forward, “Yeah. My little brother Hugo. A tiger woman ate him… in there.” Maria pointed to the tiger’s house and the bear looked over at the fairly inactive house with a disappointed look, “No party, huh? Crap!” Confused and panicked, Maria asked, “W-what’s a Consumption Party? And are you gonna help or not? My brother is digesting!” A smug look crossed Grizzly’s muzzle, she knelt down on one knee, attempting to get closer down to your level, but the near 12-foot bear still had to crane her neck a good bit, “You’re newbies here aren’t ya’?”

You three nodded, making Grizzly’s grin grow wider. She chuckled and started to explain, “Look, I hate to break it to ya’, but I think you’re brother is going to end up as nothing but tiger butt fat! At Vampyre Lane it’s legal for an anthro, like moi, to eat a human like you.” Grizzly giggles as she specifically points to Maria. The girl looked absolutely heartbroken, but the stinky fat bear gleefully continued, “So unless she’s a bankrobber who swallowed a rare diamond or something, I don’t even have permission to enter her house.” Maria lowered her head and started to cry, tears flowing from her eyes as she silently sniffled. You and Kevin put a hand on each of her shoulders, trying to comfort her. You try to cheer Maria up, “Don’t worry. We’ll find a way.” But the fat bear woman has other plans!
115331221111113.title: A very chubby and smelly brown bear woman!

choices: Grizzly gobbles up Maria
Grizzly dumps Maria in the driver's seat before sitting on her
Grizzly drops her pants and devours Maria with her ass!
1153312211111131.content:
"Oh ho ho, I think not buddy. You called me out here, letting me believe there was going to be a party. If that's not the case, I'll just have to take you three to the party. All aboard." Grizzly announced happily as she grabbed you and Kevin by the arm. You struggled as best you could, but against a 12 foot tall bear woman it was of little use. It didn't stop you from trying though, as any effort you could make to stop yourself from getting closer to the stench radiating off her body would be worth it. You didn't have the words to describe it, but it would haunt your nightmares for some time to come. She all but lifted you off your feet and dragged both you and Kevin to her car.

Grizzly hoisted Kevin up, catching him under her arm to free up a hand to open the back door. With brutish strength she threw you into the oversized vehicle. Your scramble for the exit was interrupted by Kevin crash-landing on top of you. The back of the bear woman's car was pretty much what you'd expect from a cop car. A spartan back seat, a metal frame to stop you from climbing onto the front seats and nothing you could use to save yourself.

"Please miss Grizzly, we don't want to be eaten." Kevin pleaded, but she didn't react. Instead she just leaned forward and pushed her rear against the car, blocking your only exit with her large butt. You and Kevin held eachother, terrified by the strange spectacle before you. She huffed and grunted before unleashing a large fart right into the back of the car. The interior of her patrol vehicle didn't smell too rosy already, but now it had become downright unbearable. Kevin's pleas devolved into coughing as you both struggled to breathe the fetid air.

Maria was shaken to her very core. First she learned her brother was reduced to tiger food, then the idea that this was all legal somehow, and now this sadistic cop was going to do the same to her friends? She wiped away her tears, sorrow ticking over into blinding rage. She wouldn't let these beasts harm her friends any longer. First she would free you from Grizzly's clutches. Then she was going to march over to that overgrown cat and force her to puke up Hugo.

"Ah, now that's crowd control." Grizzly smugly complimented her foul gas, looking back to see the two tasty humans in the back of the car gasping for fresh air. But where'd the third one gone? Her confusion didn't last long when a sharp pain echoed from her lower leg. The bear woman felt another sting as Maria was kicking her in the shins. The police officer grumbled disapprovingly, but couldn't see the culprit. Her own rotund belly was concealing the pint-sized attacker. All she could do was reach down blindly and hope for the best. Her large digits made contact and in an instant they grabbed hold of the girl that had been kicking her shins.

"Stop that, you little-" Grizzly held the struggling girl in front of her face, chastising her. But Maria cut her attacker off with a swift punch to the nose. She was immediately filled with regret when her vision swung over to the bear's looming armpit. As if her natural scent wasn't unkempt enough, the foul pits seem to be in a league of their own. Maria is pressed into the damp fur face first, the bear lowering her arm to completely entrap the girl in the swampy stench. Her struggles quickly weakened as the cruel bear forced Maria to breathe in the contaminated air. The body sticking out from her armpit shook and shuddered. Grizzly released her little prisoner before any real damage could be done, but any semblance of resistance had been thoroughly smothered.

Once more the bear cop menacingly held Maria in front of her large muzzle, an unsettling toothy grin adorning her face. But with what little strength and willpower the girl had left she swung and punched the bear in the nose again.

"Ow! G'dammit! That's it! You get special punishment!" She roared as she slammed the back door shut, locking you and Kevin in the back of the car. You could only watch as the bear gave Maria her horrifying punishment.
1153312211111131.title: She drags you three to one of these crazy parties

choices: You arrive to one of these Consumption Parties with no incident
Grizzly gets a dispatch call about an emergency
11533122111111311.content:
You and Kevin wiggle over to the other side of the back seat to better see what Grizzly was doing with Maria. Your friend all but hung limp in Grizzly’s paw. She weakly kicked and clawed at the bear woman’s muscular paw, but she was no match for the three tons of muscle that was Officer Grizzly. A devious, toothy grin reformed on her muzzle, “Now… where was I?” The thick, black lips parted in front of Maria, the bears acrid breath blasted in her face, it was even worse than her damp, furry armpits. The bear swiftly shoved Maria into her maw, easily shoving in Maria’s entire upper body.

She closed her lips around Maria, only leaving Maria’s kicking legs outside of her mouth. Inside the nasty mouth, the bear’s tongue licked Maria all over, slapping her around the sweltering maw. Teasingly slapping her already fat gut, Officer Grizzly tilted her head back, opening her mouth slightly to accept in the rest of Maria. The girl shrieked as she slid down the bear’s tongue like a slip-and-slide straight into the dark gullet. Grizzly snapped her jaws shut behind Maria, and with a satisfied GLURK, send a Maria-sized bulge down the ursine’s thick neck and down to her belly.

Although, you couldn’t even see Maria under all that bear belly chub. Grizzly bumped her fist against her chest as her furry cheeks swelled up, she let out a meaty burp, BBBWWWAAUUURRRRPPPPPP! Grizzly readjusted herself and lazily stepped up to her car, letting out a sloppy fart as she got back in the drivers seat, “And that… is why you don’t piss off a bear.” Grizzly chuckled as you two stare at her mortified as she drove off deeper in Vampyre Lane.
11533122111111311.title: Grizzly gobbles up Maria

choices: You three run for it as the tiger chases after you
There’s strength in numbers, you three try to fight the tiger
1153312211112.content:
The three of you hop off the top of the couch and slam into the tiger belly. “OOF!” The tiger groans in pain. You three can’t balance on the jiggly surface of the tiger’s belly and you fall onto the floor on top of each other. The tiger groans and clutches her belly in pain, “Aw, ow… what hit me?” She puts a paw over her muzzle as if she’s going to barf but all that comes out is… BBWWLLOOORRRPPPP! She smacks her lips as she regains her senses and starts to get up, that’s when she notices you three scrambling to get up off the floor. As you three fearfully back away the tiger lady gets a big, evil grin on her muzzle as she stands up and slowly approaches you, “Heya kids, long time, no see. Back for more candy?”

With a determined look of anger on her face, Maria stomped up to the towering feline, “I know you ate my little brother, now spit him back out now!” The tiger playfully picked her teeth with a claw and rubbed her belly, absentmindedly processing Maria’s words, “Little… brother? Oh yeah, him…” She teasingly giggles as she jiggles her squirming belly, “He tasted great! Thanks for that.” Maria’s anger was at a boiling point, she wanted her brother back, and now, “Barf him up now, or else?” The tiger woman cackled, rolling her eyes, “Or else WHAT?” Maria snarl, “Or else THIS”, with all her might, Maria swung her fist against the tiger’s bloated belly. It jiggled and sloshed about… and Maria’s punch did absolutely nothing. As her rage started to dissipate, fear crept over her. The tiger continued to giggle in amusement, putting her paws on her thick hips, raising a brow with a smug grin and a sassy pose, “So… that all?”
1153312211112.title: The tiger lady wakes up, but doesn't hurl

choices: The tiger woman subdues you too.
You succeed in freeing up Kevin and/or Maria
Your hits are too weak to stop the tiger from eating Maria right in front of you
11533122111122.content:
If one punch wasn't going to cut it, the big tiger woman was simply going to need more punches. Maria let out a ferocious cry and charged in again. You and Kevin quickly tag along, hoping to overwhelm your opponent in an uneven fight. She just smiled and took another blow to the gut, showing a hint of strain. The tiger was making herself look invulnerable, but those hits were slowly whittling away at her. Now you just had to make sure she didn't hit back. Those paws could probably do some damage, but with a cruel smirk she reveals an even deadlier weapon.

With Maria's next punch flying in the tiger crouched down, opening her arms wide to welcome the fighty intruder. The blow glanced of her fuzzy shoulder and your friend found herself grappled in a tight hug. "Gotcha!" The tiger said victoriously. Maria grumbled and hissed, but the mighty hold of the tiger woman was unrelenting. Soon her flailing began to get subdued by the ferocious squeeze put on her. But with her arms full, the tiger woman still had to contend with you and Kevin raining blows onto her waist and belly. Neither of you hit as hard as Maria, but it was beginning to get mighty annoying. The tiger put her back to a wall to stop you two from flanking her or attacking from behind.

Kevin grew even more enraged, seeing the evil tiger woman manhandling his friend. With a feral yell he lunged towards her, but at the last moment she stepped forward, avoiding his assault and leaving him between the wall and a rapidly approaching tiger butt. "Too slow!" She taunted. With a loud SLAM the tiger pressed her bottom against Kevin's head, mashing it into the wall. The pictures in the living room rattled from the impact. To add insult to injury the tiger unleashed a large fart, right in Kevin's face. Muffled screaming let you know he was in agony.

It was up to you now to save your friends. Maria looked ready to pass out, the tiger's grip on her never seizing for a moment. Kevin wasn't in much better shape, the tiger's foul attack leaving him squirming to push away the large butt pinning his head against the wall. On the upside, her hands were full and she couldn't move her hips without also freeing up Kevin. If ever there was a time she was vulnerable, it was now. Heroically you charge in.
11533122111122.title: There’s strength in numbers, rush the tiger!

choices: Maria is going down the hatch
Kevin is going up her butt
115331221111221.content: You run at her stomach with all you’ve got. She could handle two little humans, but this third boy was going to ruin her night and her appetite if he kept wailing on her belly. As the boy charged at her, she did the last thing she thought she could do to defend herself. As you charge at her she lifts her footpaw up and slams it where the sun don’t shine! That’s right, she kicked you right between the legs. A dirty move, but an affective one! You moan in pain and fall over on your side, grabbing your pained crotch, “Ugh… jerk!” The tiger woman giggled as he placed her footpaw over your head, firmly squishing you between her nasty foot and her tiled flooring, “Jerk, huh? I’ve been called worse by my prey.” The tiger eyed up Maria as she licked her lips and her belly rumbled audibly. The large feline pressing her stinky butt more into Kevin’s face as she farted on him, “So many snacks, so little time. Who to eat first?”
115331221111221.title: The tiger woman subdues you too.

choices: Leave the town behind and rush for the gates
Try to rally up any remaining humans and take the fight to the anthros
115331221111222.content:
You smash into the tiger’s belly. It jiggles and sloshes about but it seems to do little good. The tiger giggles and sneers down at you, “Sorry kiddo, but your little punches are no match for a big cat like me. Better luck next time…” Her grin grew as she opened her maw and slurped her tongue across Maria’s face, “But I don’t think there will be a next time.” The tiger open’s her mouth incredibly wide, bringing the struggling Maria towards her jaws. Maria flailed and cried, “No, please. Don’t!” You feverishly looked around until your eyes settled on a large metal baseball bat in the front doorway, it was left near a disheveled and tattered costume, possibly from a once-trick-or-treater turn tiger fat. You sprint over and grab the bat as the tiger shoves Maria’s upperbody into her maw.

You charge the tiger again but this time swing the bat straight at the tiger’s gut with every ounce of strength you could muster. It makes contact and the next thing you hear as a thud and a deep, guttural and displease, “EEWWWUUUUAAAAGGHHHHHH!” The force of the bat forced the tiger to spit Maria up and upset the big feline’s belly so much you could see the bulge that was Hugo travel back up her esophagus. The tiger bent over and fell onto the ground, freeing Kevin from her bulbous butt. You could see her thick, muscular neck bulge out as Hugo was rocketed back up her throat until BBBLLUUAAWWWWGGHHHH! Bile, stomach juices, digested food and most importantly a soggy Hugo were vomited up by the tiger who keeled over afterwards, shaking in pain and clutching her stomach.

A saliva-soaked Maria rushed Hugo and embraced him in a warm hug, “You’re safe.” Hugo complained, “Big sis, I wanna go home.” Maria nodded with a big smile on her face and tears in her eyes, “We’re going to, right now.” All four of you froze in fear as you heard the near-feral growls of the tiger lady, now snarling at you four and perched on all-fours on the tiled floor, “You wish. No human has ever escaped Vampyre Lane. And for good reason.” Feeling emboldened, you charge the tiger again and smash the bat across her head, knocking her out cold. You turn back to your friends, “Grab a weapon and let’s run.” You four armed yourselves with whatever you could carry, kitchen knives, shovels, rakes, really anything you could swing or throw at these animal people.

As you four run out onto the street you start to piece together where the gates are and run towards them, until Maria grabs your shoulder and stops you, “Wait! What about the other trick-or-treaters?” Kevin whimpered, “W-what about them?” Maria shrugged as her eyes widened, “We can’t just let them get eaten?” Kevin, nearly burst into tears at this point, “We barely got away from one of those things. You think we could fight a whole town of them.” Maria grabbed Kevin’s shoulder, “But we won’t be alone, we’ll have the other trick-or-treaters to help us.”

Kevin just shook his head, “No way, I wanna go home, get in my nice, safe, warm bed… far away from anything that wants to eat me and forget tonight ever happened.” Kevin started walking off, but nervously turned around and slowed his pace when he noticed none of you were following him. You were stuck in a moral dilemma, if you were about to be eaten you’d want someone to come save you or warn you… but the fear of failing and becoming an animal-monster-person’s snack jolted a good deal of fearful thoughts into your head… and safety was so close, just a block or two away.

While you four were arguing outside, the tiger awoke and clutched her head, a small cut leaked a few drops of blood as her eyes narrowed in anger, “Grrrr, I like my food a bit frisky and lively, but not like this. I’ve never even had food escape from me before. What are these humans teaching their young, military combat training?” Snarling and enraged the tiger limped to her telephone and dialed a number. Standing there with her face scrunched in anger she waited until she heard another voice on the line, “Hello, Mayor Scale? It’s Sam… we’ve got some troublemakers this Halloween, shut the whole town down, they’re trying to get out.” What happens now?
115331221111222.title: You succeed in freeing up Kevin and/or Maria

choices: Sirens blare, the patrol car spotted you
You stay hidden, for now
Kevin's watch beeps. There's no time left, you've got to run!
1153312211112221.content:
A low voice on the other end of the line spoke in a calm tone. "Easy there Sam, it's just some kids. No need to shut down all the festivities because they turned out to be a bit more... slippery this year. Tell ya what, I'll have an extra patrol goin' round near the gate. That oughta slow down their escape attempts. Should give ya plenty of time to get back at 'em. Go get 'em tiger." The mayor chuckled a little at his own pun. Before the tiger woman could protest any further he hung up. She stared at the phone in disbelief. She'd been assaulted in her own house and this was all the help she would get?!

"Aw, forget it! If you want to get this done, you gotta do it your damn self..." She growled to herself. Her head still stung and her gut was showing a large bruise even through her dense fur. But with fierce determination she looked around. The scuffle had left a few pieces of your costumes behind, which she eagerly picked up and smelled. Her big nose almost sucked the small scraps of cloth inside, but their scent was distinct. Musty, sweaty and rich with fear. She locked the door behind her and set out on her hate-fueled charge. Her only stop was the garden shed, from which she retrieved a length of rope. No more miss nice tiger for these four. She didn't just want her meal back. She was going to end the brat that dared to hit her with her own bat. The image of her hands throttling the life out of you put a smile on her face as she set off in hot pursuit.

-----


Many houses further down the street you, Kevin, Maria and Hugo were hiding in a bush. All of you had weapons, mostly tools and utensils quickly stolen from the tiger's house on the way out. For the first time since entering that horrid place you felt safe enough to stop and talk.

"Look, I'm all for rallying the other trick-or-treaters, Maria. But it's getting late. Who knows how many of them are even still alive at this point? And that tiger lady nearly managed to take on four of us by herself. A neighborhood full of tigers, bears and worse is gonna wipe the floor with us, no matter how many kids we rally. I say we get outta here and we tell our story to everyone. Tell the police, call the army. That's gonna put an end to this for good."

Kevin liked your plan. At least the part that involved getting the hell out of this nightmare of a street. Maria grumbled a little about being able to take on the tiger woman if she hadn't caught her off guard. Ultimately she relented. Hugo didn't say a word, but quietly nodded in agreement. With your priorities straight you peek out from your hiding place. The street was empty, with the exception of a single large car slowly rolling down the street. The driver side window was open and a strange creature hung it's head out. It was too dark to recognize immediately, but when the car passed a street light you realized it was a cop car. Worse yet, you get a better look at the cop. His strange nose and large, leathery ears give you the idea that he might be a bat. Occasionally he opens his maw and lets out a soundless scream. Your eyes widen in fear and you practically drag the others out of the bush and over a fence.

"What the hell?!" Maria protests.

"He's a bat. He can use echolocation to see us hiding in that bush." You hiss back, urging your friends to keep their heads down. All four of you huddle against the wooden fence, hidden from view. Painfully slowly you hear the car roll by, the cop occasionally mumbling something to his colleague. Minutes tick by with none of you daring to peek over the fence to see if they're really gone. Finally Maria dares to look and confirms the coast is clear.

You skulk from house to house, terrified of every shadow. Two of you had already been in the bellies of these beasts and Maria came close to discovering what their insides looked like too. Determined to stay out of any more maws you press on. Legend has it the gate only appears during Halloween night. If you're too slow, you might end up stuck here for a year. There's no way you would last that long in a neighborhood full of animals that wanted to eat you. Things seem to be going well. Progress was steady, only occasionally interrupted by hiding from the patrol car. At the last intersection you turned the corner and you could see the gate all the way at the end of the next street. You still had a decent way to travel, but at least the end was in sight.
1153312211112221.title: Leave the town behind and rush for the gates

choices: One Year Later...
You thought Halloween was the only time Vampyre Lane appears?
11533122111122211.content:
Unfortunately, there were no substantial openings, cracks between houses or alleyways on the street heading towards the gate. You’d be out in the open and vulnerable, but you had plenty of time, and it was only one town block, you could probably sprint to the end of the block in a minute. As long as you kept your wits about you, you four would be fine. WEE-WOO, WEE-WOO, WEE-WOO. A blaring bright light shines from behind you, you could hear the bat officer yell from his car, “Halt. You four are out past curfew. Do you know how much trouble you’re in? Come here and-“ You shriek louder than you thought possible, “RUN!” Without even looking back you four run at top speed. Luckily for you, you were in a running contest with a bat and an overweight gator, as long as you kept your pace you’d make it. You’re practically almost there.

Unluckily for you, the tiger woman darted out in front of you four, a wicked grin on her muzzle, “All-aboard the Digestion Express! Momma’s hungry!” All four of you don’t nearly have enough time to stop, you four slam into the tiger at top speed knocking all of you over onto the ground. The tiger grounded, temporarily defeating, holding her head as it seemed to be getting injured every time she ran into you little brats. But she’d get her meal. To make matters worse, the tiger had fallen on top of all four of you. She may look fairly skinny, even compared to most of the other anthros here, but you could attest that she weighs a ton, three tons in total to be exact.

You speedily worm your way out from under her as the bat and gator start to close in. Your heart is nearly beating out of your chest. You grab Maria and Hugo and pull them out from under the tiger. You three talk in near-blabber language as you talk and scream over each other, “COME-ON-COME-ON-OH-GOD-IS-SHE-WAKING-UP-LETS-GO-LETS-GO-I-WANNA-GO-HOME-THEYâ €™RE-GONNA-EAT-US-WERE-NOT-FOOD-OH-GOD-OH-GOD-NO!” Once Hugo and Maria are free they run ahead and past the gates, back into the safety of the human world. You notice Kevin is still trapped under her gut, you grab his hand, starting to pull him out, but the bat grabs your hand, “You’re coming with us. You just assaulted this poor lady.” You yelled nearly in tears as you try to yank yourself away from the bat, “She’s trying to eat me!”

The bat grimaced in disgust, “Yeah? Well I’m about to eat you if you don’t chill out little guy, now-“ Is this really it? Is this really how your life ends? Becoming a snack for some hungry animal? You thought you’d grow up, go to college, fall in love, raise a family… but nope! You’re just animal chow. It couldn’t end here, you’re so close. In your panicked frenzy you do the only thing you can do. You headbutt the bat’s crotch. He groans in pain, clutching between his legs as he collapses. The gator tries to grab you next but you slam your fist between his legs, eliciting a high-pitched squeal as he too falls. You return your attention back to Kevin who is now waist deep in the tiger’s mouth. Tears stream down his reddened cheeks as the tiger’s black lips travel slowly up his body, “Mom! Dad! Somebody, help me!”

As the tiger noticed you staring at her in horror, her lips form a grin as she winks at you and slurps a little more of Kevin in. You grab both of Kevin’s arms and start to heave, growling as you literally wrestle your friend out of the tiger woman’s maw. You unknowningly plant your foot on the tiger’s throat to get some leverage, the tiger gags and coughs, allowing Kevin to slip out of her mouth. Kevin was about to collapse and continue crying but you dragged him along with you. It would be no time before the tiger, bat and gator were after you two. You see Maria and Hugo cheering you on from the gate, but you could also hear the tiger growling behind you. You make the mistake of looking behind you to see the tiger sprinting after you. You try to run faster, you could hear your heart rapidly beating and feel your legs pumping like pistons. But… you make it. You both skid onto the dusty forest floor but you made it past the gate.

Two huge, black metal gates slam shut behind you, the tiger chasing after you face-plants against the gate, cutting her face in a few places. You four eye your defeated predator. And to think, you four could be stewing away inside her right now. Maria, wanting to gloat, approached the gate and kicked it, “Yeah, that’s right. Don’t mess with us.” The tiger snarled and tried to claw at Maria, although she’s out of reach. Snarling the tiger woman replied, standing back up on her hind legs, “This isn’t over… there’s always next Halloween.” Kevin, in tears, blurted out, “You think we’re coming back here?” The tiger chuckled and winked at him, “Don’t worry morsel, a good predator always gets her prey.” On that mysterious note, the tiger turned her back to you four and walked off into the misty night.
11533122111122211.title: Sirens blare, the patrol car spotted you

choices: Answer the Door
You notice the door is mysteriously wide open with no one there
115331221111222111.content:
You four tiredly walked back through the trail in the woods and back to your neighborhood. You didn’t really have the time to register it while you were fighting for your lives, but you all looked pretty disheveled, with some cuts and bruises littered across your bodies, and you four smelt like a hot dumpster. Maria groaned, running her fingers through her messy, wet hair, “Yuck! I hope shampoo can get rid of tiger drool.” Kevin was the first to leave the group, you got to his house first. He let out a few good cries with you, Maria and Hugo before heading back towards his front porch, trying to figure out what he’ll tell his folks. Now it was just you, Maria and Hugo. As you walked down the now silent and dark streets of your hometown Maria spoke, “T-thanks for helping save me, and my brother. I don’t think we would’ve survived if we didn’t work together.” You had to agree, working together is what saved you four back there.

Your heart sunk when you three made it to Maria’s house. Her parents were good friends with yours, so there was no way they weren’t going to find out about this. Once inside you and Maria decided to tell them the truth, while Hugo went up to bed. Obviously, none of your parents believed you. They thought you had just went off in the woods and ran into a wolf perhaps or a raccoon, and you were just adding all of these ‘mystical’ elements to your story. Needless to say all of your parents were disappointed in you four and you were all grounded for a month. They did think it was a bit strange that you kept sticking to your guns about ‘the Halloween town filled with man-eating animal people’ months after the fact, but they brushed it off as your overactive imaginations or a game you four were playing.

Meanwhile, on November 1st. in Vampyre Lane, as accustom for every Day-After-Halloween in the town everyone was off work to tend to their hangovers and bulging bellies The sun rose in the sky, and between the times of 7a.m. – 8a.m. a symphony of flushing toilets could be heard all across the sleepy town. Samantha Graves, the tiger who almost ate you last night, lay in her bed, glaring up at the ceiling with some bandages across her face and head. She rolled and squeezed a ball of yarn in her paw like a stress-ball. An hour later Samantha stepped out of her house, dressed in a navy blue bathrobe and sipping vodka out of a coffee cup, trying to numb her pain. Everyone else in her town seemed way more chipper than the dour feline. Her neighbor, Emma, a 10-ton rhino from across the street strolled out in a jogging-suit that was clearly a size-too-small for her gigantic body.

She happily waved at the tiger, “Heya Sam, Happy Halloween! Look! I even got a little decoration for next year.” Emma pulled out a small human skull from inside of her house and teasingly made some mouth movements with the skull and spoke in a high-pitched voice, “Help me! Help me! I don’t wanna be rhino fat! I’m a little human and that means I have rights and stuff.” Returning to her normal voice, the ginormous rhino cooed and grinned, poking the skull, “Aw, that’s so cute you think that Mikey! I bet you still believe in Santa too. But just like Santa, your so-called ‘human-rights’ don’t exist in a town made for anthros. You’re meant to be food!”

Sam had stopped paying attention to the rhino, and with a shrug and a growl, Sam skulked back into her house, opting to sleep the day away and try to forget about her humiliating failure. Deeper in the town, both the bat and gator cops who were supposed to arrest you were getting yelled at by their Mayor, Mayor Scale, a tall Komodo Dragon, equally muscular as he is chubby, who seemed to even loom over his fellow anthro citizens. “So… you let them go?” The gator stammered, “T-they overpowered us?” A sly grin formed on Scale’s snout, “Four small, skinny, human trick-or-treaters overpowered two trained anthro officers?” The bat and gator nervously looked at each other and returned their gaze to Scale, nodding. Scale snapped his claws at them, “Alright, cool. Good to know… you’re fired!” The bat, watering up, whimpered, “But-“ Mayor Scale grimaced, “F-I-R-E-D, what does that spell boys? Fired!”

It had been a year since you and your friends had gone to Vampyre Lane, and you certainly were not going back this year. As a matter of fact, the whole experience kind of soured Halloween for you four. Your parents thought it was a bit odd you were holding a Monster Movie Marathon at home with your friends when you could be out trick-or-treating but they didn’t press too much into it. Your parents were off to a costume party so it would just be you, Maria, Hugo and Kevin once again. After your folks left, Maria, Kevin and Hugo soon joined you. This was going to be a much better, and more cozy Halloween. They brought their own bags of candy and snacks, and you busted out some horror movies on demand and some video games. As Maria sat on the couch next to you she smiled, “Much better than last year right?” You grinned and chuckled, “Beats squirming around in a fox belly.” The movie started up, it was a super bloody and gory, new remake called The Creature from Blood Lagoon.

Meanwhile, in Vampyre Lane, as the sun was setting, the town was getting filled up with more naïve trick-or-treaters. But four anthros weren’t interested in their town’s festivities. Standing at the town’s gates were a tiger, a fox, a bat, and a gator… all four anthros had a serious bone to pick with you. Samantha turned back to face the other anthros, “You guys ready?” The fox wore a look of worry on her face, “I-I don’t know. We don’t typically go TO the human world, usually we let the humans come to us.” Samantha growled and bared her teeth, “You want your prey back? Then come with me! If not, fine! Stay here, I don’t really care.” The tiger turned back around and marched past the gates into the human world, uncharted territory for anthro folk.

The three other anthros nervously marched on with her. As happy, smiling trick-or-treaters passed the anthro group, they gleefully directed them towards Vampyre Lane. Once they made it out of the woods and onto a crowded street, they gazed around and saw the crowds of humans walking around in costume. The gator’s mouth watered as he licked his lips, slowly walking towards a group of trick-or-treaters and their parents. Samantha slammed a paw into his chest, “HOLD IT! This is the human’s playing field. If we want a nice, easy night of revenge and snacking we can’t do what we’d normally do at home. We need to single them out and eat them then. I suggest we get back at those four from last year first and then pick off whoever we like, deal?” The other three nodded.

As the four anthros walked through the crowd of humans they got various compliments for their costumes. One drunk human even smacked Samantha’s butt, “Wow lady… yer really somethin’. Big, beautiful, furry. Dig duh costume! Really lifelike and stuff…” The tiger giggled, “Oh, ya’ know… spent my whole life making this thing. If you’d like, I could show you what the inside looks like if we cross paths a little later.” The young adult groaned, “Woah, really?” Samantha shrugged, “Sure, why not, no harm right. But I gotta date with a friend right now, so see you later sweetums.” The tiger blew the drunk human a kiss as she and her group scampered off, she quickly tore a shred of cloth off his spaceman costume to make sure she could track him down if she wanted seconds. Speaking of tracking, she pulled out a few shreds of your pirate costume from her pocket. Sniffing them she quickly picked up on your location.

A few streets and town blocks later, the group of four anthros were standing in front of your house. The tiger grinned, “Hope you four little turds remembered what I said. I good predator ALWAYS gets her prey. Once I’m done with you four, all that’ll be left is little turds.” The anthros walked up to your front porch, ringing your doorbell and putting on their best ‘innocent child’ impressions, “Trick or Treat!” You paused the monster movie as you got up from the couch. Maria smiled and commented, “First hit of the night.” You nodded as you pulled out the candy bowl from the kitchen. Kevin whimpered, peaking out through his eyes, “Hurry up, I want us to get past this scary part, and I don’t wanna look.” Maria rolled her eyes, “Kevin, you literally made it out of the jaws of a tiger monster last Halloween, and you’re still scared of a fake monster on TV, even Hugo isn’t as scared as you.”
115331221111222111.title: One Year Later...

choices: The anthros chase you around your house
You all escape your house but are pursued by the anthros
1153312211112221111.content:
As your friends bickered you opened up the door with a big grin on your face as you presented the candy bowl to the trick-or-treaters, “Hey guys, Happy Hallo… ween…” You looked up at the four creatures at your door with a stupefied look. Your eyes were wide and your mouth hung open. You weren’t necessarily scared, but angry, surprised and shocked. All four anthros from last Halloween stood at your doorstep with smug grins on their faces, muzzles and snouts. Samantha dug her paw into the bowl, “Oooooh, whatta we got here! ButterBars? Milky Maze? Mike-I-Likes?” She pulled out a paw-full, basically half the bowl, and shoved it into her maw, noisly chewing it. Between chewing, talking with her mouthful, the tiger continued, “Nice variety of candy ya’ got here kid, but I think you four will taste even better.”

Trying to hold back a scream you reply, “H-how did you…” The fox who swallowed you up last Halloween interjected, “Get here? The portal opens between both our worlds on Halloween. Technically humans can go into our world, and anthros can come into yours. It’s just a lot easier for us to let you humans willingly come to us.” The gator added, “But since you ruined our Halloween last year… we thought this year we could ruin yours.” You and the fours anthros just stood there, in silence, both parties waiting for the other to react. After the tiger swallowed her candy she leered down at you, “So? You gonna run? Scream? Cry for help?” It took you a minute for your brain to process all of this before grabbing the door and yelling, “Nope.” You try to slam the door closed but Samantha shoves her foot into your doorway, stopping the door. She easily grabs the door and overpowers you, pushing the it back open and knocking you over. As the anthros enter your house and shut the door the tiger screams out, “Trick or Treat, smell my feet, you’ll be something good to eat!”
1153312211112221111.title: Answer the Door

choices: "Not yet." She keeps hurting you
"Yeah." She finally eats you
"Hehe, yeah." She begins pushing you up her butt
11533122111122211111.content:
You scramble to get on your feet, but the tiger is pushing herself forward. She's fortunate your house is quite spacious or she would really struggle to move in the narrow corridors. She still had to crouch down to fit, but that was the least of her concerns. All her attention was on the little human before her, struggling to get up and run away. She quickly pounced forward and crashed down on you. It wasn't a graceful sight, but she slumped her heavy body forward, pinning you down and drawing out a pained yelp. Immediately surprised chatter rang from the living room. The fox and the bat looked at the doorway from which the sound came and then at eachother. "Score! They're all here." They whispered at eachother. Though muffled, those voices were clear as day. They tip-toed around the tiger that was laid out in the hallway.

The bat paused, looking back to see his gator friend still struggling with the front door. He was the bulkiest of the four, and he just couldn't get his wide shoulders inside. With a resigned huff he called out to his friends. "You go in, I'll catch any runners. And if you get all of them, save one for me." The bat nodded with a gleeful smile.

You wanted to call out to your friends, to tell them to run. But the tiger had you pinned and a large paw was covering your mouth. She leaned her head in as close as possible and whispered in your ear. "I've waited all year for this." Her voice was sickly sweet. But as she kept whispering her tone become increasingly spiteful and venomous. "I've had a lot of time to imagine all the things I'm going to do to you."

Maria, Kevin and Hugo were sitting on the couch, all looking at the doorway with a bemused stare. What was all that noise about? Did the first trick-or-treater really scare their friend into screaming? They soon let out their own screams as the door opened and the fox and the bat walked into the room. Immediately Maria and Kevin bolted, running as fast as they could. Hugo was stuck, sitting like a deer in headlights as the bat leapt towards him. With a loud crash he slammed onto the couch, causing it to creak under his weight. He wrapped Hugo in his arms and showed off his needle-sharp teeth.

"Please don't eat me mister vampire..." He whimpered. The bat just laughed.

"I'm not a vampire. I'm far worse. A vampire just wants your blood." He put his fangs on the boy's neck, making him freeze in terror. "I want all of you." The bat's maw opened wide and took in Hugo's whole head. Though the fox could give him a run for his money, the bat was the skinniest of the four intruders. Nevertheless he gulped down the boy with alarming speed. His stomach ballooned out, a weakly squirming bulge appearing within. The bat laid himself out on the couch, leaving the fox to chase the remaining two brats.

She had them cornered in the living room, smiling deviously. "Do you two want to play a game? It's called 'get in my belly!'" She lunged forward, but Maria and Kevin both dodged to different sides. The fox couldn't decide who to grab and just caught two big handfuls of air. The two ran as fast as they could to the front door. They had to get out of here, call the police or something. Surely the human police would be able to help them instead of trying to eat them too. But as they entered the hallway, they found the front door to be blocked. The tiger woman sat there, crushing you in a powerful one-armed bear hug as she kept you from screaming in pain with her other hand. Before the fox could catch up they ran up the stairs and to your bedroom. Hopefully the window was unlocked. They heard the fox rush up the stairs after them, cursing the tiny steps and nearly falling over.

As Maria ran through your room a stray toy car sent her scrambling to the ground. Kevin didn't stop for a second, still more concerned about your window. Even when Maria shrieked as the fox grabbed her leg and dragged her to her slavering maw he didn't stop. Someone had to survive this, and it would be him. His hands worked manically to unlock the window, turning the latch and pushing it wide open. The hinge creaked, not accustomed to such rough treatment. With at least two hungry predators between here and the front door the boy saw no other option than to jump. The fox made a token effort to grab him, but she was too busy subduing the wildly struggling Maria. With not a second to waste he jumped. His eyes widened when he saw where he was about to land.

The gator opened wide and braced for impact, showing off his huge, toothy maw. Kevin landed roughly on his big tongue, causing the huge jaws to snap shut like a bear trap. Mercifully none of the boy's limbs were caught on the long rows of pointy teeth. The pudgy gator immediately let out a loud gulp, pushing his squirming prey right up to his ravenous gullet. The fleshy passage opened and half of Kevin vanished in the next gulp. With almost no effort the gator swallowed his prey. He prided himself on being able to gobble up trick-or-treaters fast, but this was a record even for him. He barely got to taste the kid before it went down his wide neck and into his belly. Happily patting his squirming gut and content to have gotten a little petty revenge on the kids that got him sacked last year he stood on his toes and looked through the open first floor window. It didn't look like the fox's victim was faring much better.

In an effort to subdue her the fox had sat down on her prey. Maria cried out in pain from the heavy beast sitting on her back. "That's what you get for costing me my meal last year. I should've just cheated and eaten you all. But noooo, the one time I decide to play fair and you manage to beat me at my own game." She grumbled aloud, grinding her butt on the pinned girl. After a bit more torment she finally got off her prey and held up the girl. Maria didn't offer more than a pathetic whimper before the vixen's maw took in her feet. With every loud gulp another quarter of her body sank down that slimy passage of her through. The fox felt her neck bulge out to deal with her prey and greedily she kept swallowing more of Maria. In under a minute the last of the bulge in her neck sank down, joining her belly. She saw the gator watching and gave him a sly smile. He nodded and smiled back.

After a few minutes of enjoying their squirming prey the fox and the bat returned to the hallway. The tiger was still there, and so were you. She had ripped off your shirt and numerous bruises were forming on your chest from her rough treatment. You were laid on the floor before her as she put a heavy foot on your torso. When a dull pop informed her she had broken a rib she relented, listening to your pathetic whimpering. You were too exhausted to scream, worn out from the beating you'd already taken.

"You almost done, Sam?" The fox asked. Seeing you laying there almost made her pity you, but after last year she didn't have much mercy left in her for you and your friends. The tiger, not noticing her friends until now, looked up with a huge, toothy smile.
11533122111122211111.title: The anthros chase you all around the house

choices: We play a game of Hide And Eat
You like to fight show much? How about we wrestle
115331221111223.content:
You barrel into the tiger’s stomach. It jiggles and wobbles from the impact but the tiger looks ultimately un-phased. She looks down at you with a teasing grin as she continues to squeeze Maria, “Is that all you got? I knew you humans were wimps, but this is pathetic. Oh well, it ain’t Halloween if we don’t end the night with a big meal.” The tiger looked into Maria’s eyes as she licked her face, “Wouldn’t you agree?” Maria tried her best to shake her head but it didn’t matter, as the tiger’s licking gave way to her opening her muzzle extremely wide, easily wide enough to fit poor Maria in, and the some.

The tiger slams her lips down on Maria’s waist, OOMPH! Now the girl’s entire upper half was in the drooling tiger maw. You continued to kick and punch at the tiger, but you were but a minor annoyance to her. Your pitiful attempts to save your friend were cute to her, she let out a muffled cackled as she slurped and tasted one of your best friends. This couldn’t be happening. You could see Maria feet kick about rapidly, but unfortunately she was pivoted in the tiger’s mouth in a way where her feet couldn’t quite reach a sensitive area like her nose or throat.

You could also hear Maria’s angry protests from in the mouth. Typical Maria, you were almost happy and proud, she was always the spunky fighter of your group which is why your neighborhood bullies never started anything with her. If you were in her shoes right now you’d be wetting yourself, not insulting the person eating you. But to your horror, the tiger tilted her head back, lifting Maria’s kicking legs in the air. She started gulping, sending a Maria-sized bulge down her thick neck. She slurped up the legs like noodles before one final gulp sent Maria down the tiger’s esophagus. Maria landed in the tiger’s belly, joining her little brother, making her big belly even larger. The tiger slapped her belly triumphantly and unleashed a rancid, sloppy belch at you. She giggled, jiggling her gut, “See? Isn’t this better? You get to see your brother again.”

The only reply the tiger got was muffled yells and panicked thrashing in her gut, which only mad her more gassy. She pressed her butt even more firmly against Kevin and let out an atom bomb of a fart, it was hot, wet, and stanky! As Kevin protested the tiger laughed, “Sorry back there, trick-or-treaters make me gassy.” The tiger grinned evilly down at you, and teasingly flailed her paws at you, “So? Got any more kung-fu moves you wanna show me kid? I could tell they’re pretty affective, you couldn’t even stop me from eating your friend.” The tiger moves away from the wall, freeing Kevin from the grasp of her big bubble butt. He collapses onto the tiled floor, gasping for fresh air. The tiger looms over you and licks her lips, “Don’t worry just yet, little guy. I like to play with my food before I eat it… so how about…”
115331221111223.title: Your hits are too weak to stop the tiger from e...

choices: Flee from the tiger lady and try to find a hiding spot
Try to climb the fence as the tiger closes in
1153312211113.content:
You all fall onto the tiger’s belly with a good bit of force. You slam onto her gut and immediately hear her gag. Your stay on top of her belly is short lived as her startled thrashing quickly makes you three lose your balance and fall to the floor. The tiger lady heaves and slumps her head off the side of the couch and towards the floor. She grips her muzzle with a paw, glowing yellow eyes bulged as the lump in her belly starts to move up her throat. Then, it all comes out, WWHHUUUAAAUULLLLLL! Her maw opens wide and a torrent of stomach goop, tiger bile and even a quivering Hugo spew out of the tiger’s muzzle.

Maria beams ear to ear as she runs up to her shaking little brother and wraps him in a big hug. He was covered in belly goop and smelt worse than a dumpster, but Maria didn’t care. She was just glad her little brother was safe. The wash-off paint on his face had long disappeared inside the moist, insufferable heat in the tiger gut and Hugo’s tiger Halloween costume was a bit tattered but aside from that he was fine. Hugo nearly burst into tears, “Thank you for saving me, Big Sis.” Maria nearly cried as well, “Anything for you, you little pest.” The heart-warning reunion was cut short with a growl. The tiger had come to her senses and was now glaring at you four. Her eyes were wide and glowing, her teeth bared and snarling, and instead of standing upright the anthro tiger opted for walking on all-fours.

She roared at you four, making you all squeal in terror and barrel out of her house. The tiger rolled her eyes, “I know I said I like fast food, but this is ridiculous.” Now chasing after you on four legs, the tiger could run a much larger distance than she could upright, another advantage the hungry animal lady had on you tasty humans. You four were quickly out of the tiger’s house and into the cold October night. Maria carried Hugo on her back since his short legs would only slow you all down. With your legs pumping and your chests heaving you all ran as fast as your legs could carry you. You just hoped that would somehow be enough to outrun a literal tiger.

You squeal in terror as you could almost hear the thumping of the tiger’s paws as she was gaining on you. You yell, “We’re almost at the main street, near the gates.” You round a corner and you three run up to the entrance, and that’s when your heart sank. The gates… were closed! You nearly have a nervous breakdown as you beat against the huge, iron gates, “No! No! No! What happened?” Kevin checked his watch, starting to cry, “Oh no. It’s past midnight guys.” Maria asked, “What’s that mean?” Tears in his eyes, Kevin replied, “It means we can’t go home. Vampyre Lane only exists during Halloween night. It’s not Halloween anymore. And since this town only appears in our world during holidays… that means we’re stuck here ‘til Thanksgiving.” You, Maria and Hugo all shrieked, “WHAT!?” Then, if that wasn’t enough bad news, the tiger lady rounded the corner and starts galloping after you, “Did someone say SNACKTIME!?”
1153312211113.title: Success! you get her to cough up Hugo

choices: Confront the tiger lady and face her head-on
Try to find a ways of escape… or at least a hiding place
11533122112.content:
Unfortunately for you three, tigers have a really good sense of hearing… and I mean REALLY good! The tiger lady was easily woken up and alerted to your presence as soon as your feet stepped on the floor of her bedroom. She even smelt your scents. You were the trio of trick-or-treaters from before. Her belly rumbled as she licked and smacked her lips, “Guess it’s time for some tricks and treats!” You three silently tip toe into the living room, you’re so caught up in avoiding the tiger lady, you just assume she’s still lazily sleeping on the couch. Unbeknownst to you three she had disappeared from the living room.

You three huddled together behind one of her living room chairs. With hushed breath your turn to Maria and Kevin, “Ok, as soon as we head towards the couch we’re all gonna rub up to her belly and kick it as hard as possible! Ok?” Then you heard something that made you nearly jump out of your skin. The cheery feminine voice of the tiger lady rang through your ears, “Um, if I may interject… that doesn’t sound very nice. I love my fat belly! Wanna help me make it grow bigger?” The tigress poked her grinning face out from above the chair. You three shrieked and fled from the tiger.

The tigress simply giggled as she watched the trick-or-treaters run through her house. Everything was firmly locked shut. They wouldn’t be getting out anytime soon. The tiger giggled to herself, “Ah, I love fast food!” You three completely abandoned any hope of staying quiet as you blurted out to each other. Kevin whimpered, “I told you guys this was a bad idea, now lets get outta here!” Maria scowled and retorted, “Not without my little brother. My parents will kill me if I tell them he got eaten by a tiger.” You add in, “Maria, we can’t save your little brother if the tiger eats us too. We have to think of something.” Panicked Maria blurted, “Well give us some ideas, Mr. Genius!?”
11533122112.title: The tiger woke up

choices: She picks the right cup this time
Wrong cup, looks like it’s time for thirds
115331222.content:
The two were in a state of panic as they glared at the four cups. There was really no way to tell which one the ball was under. They had to guess and hope for the best. Maria nervously pointed to the far right one. The vixen gleefully lifted the cup and cackled evilly when she saw there was no cup to be found. Kevin looked up at the fox woman with tears in his eyes, “Does that mean you’re going to eat me?” The fox woman laughed, ruffling Kevin’s hair, “You bet!” Her maw opened incredibly wide and was upon a screaming Kevin in no time. CHOMP! She slurped the squirming, crying boy up in one bite and then gulped him down.

Maria cringed as she saw the quivering bulge slide down the vixen’s esophagus. In no time Kevin was squeezed into the stomach with you. You fearfully asked him what was going on. He gave you the low down on the current situation as you gulped in fear. Meanwhile, one the outside the vixen jiggled and slapped her even fatter dome of a belly, letting out another gaseous belch in Maria’s face. With a cruel grin the anthro woman teased, “Two down… one to go. Take your pick sweetheart.” There were three cups left, surely Maria could pick the right one… right? If she didn’t you’d all be spending your last Halloween inside a fox belly. Maria worriedly looked down at the cups, “Um… uhh…”
115331222.title: Maria guesses wrong

1153312222.content:
Maria's finger shakily went from cup to cup. Her confidence was shattered. She thought she knew where the fox had hidden the bauble, but instead she'd gotten another of her friends eaten. The swollen gut of the fox woman was squirming wildly with its living contents. Her amused smile ran from ear to ear, immensely pleased with the current state of affairs. She flashed her teeth, urging Maria to make a choice already. The girl's shaky finger finally settled on the middle cup. The fox woman laughed and tipped it over, revealing nothing. Her second guess was wrong, and now it was snacktime for the fox.

She leapt forward, reaching over the booth and knocking aside the cups. Her hand wrapped around Maria's waist and pulled her off her feet. The fox woman opened wide, showing the horrified girl the huge pink maw and black abyss of her throat. But something else caught Maria's eye. The last two cups were knocked over by the fox's eager assault, revealing no bauble in either of them.

"Hey! You cheated!" She called out.

"A fox that cheats at a game? Someone call the news." The fox woman responded sarcastically, her evil smile curling up high. Maria's futile struggles were quickly cut down when the large maw snapped shut around her. Pointy teeth poked her, but the fox didn't plan on chewing. She simply held the girl in place as her throat began to accept Maria's face. A loud gulp pulled the girl's entire head down the wide gullet. More gulps quickly downed her torso, pulling her legs into the wet cavern. The fox woman's eyes were bulging out, she was struggling to swallow her prey. Maria was the largest of the three morsels, but that wouldn't deter the hungry predator. One last loud GULP sealed the deal, reducing her prey to a squirming bulge sliding down her neck.

The fox woman was panting heavily, feeling her meals struggle and squirm in her belly. She let out a loud and content BWOAAARP before grabbing a sign reading 'closed' and slapping it onto the kissing booth. She went home, rubbing her wiggling gut and smiling broadly. Today had been a good day. Her house wasn't far and she soon staggered through the front door. She grabbed a stiff drink and laid herself out on the couch, ready to get to work on her big meal. In minutes she'd dozed off, napping for hours. When she woke the fox woman hauled herself to bed, pleased to still feel the odd weak squirm coming from her bloated belly. She fell asleep almost the moment she laid herself down on her bed.

The next morning she proudly felt her body, admiring her handiwork. Her paunch had shrunken down considerably and her butt felt bigger and fuller than ever. She let out one last huge, satisfied belch, coughing up a few scraps of your costumes. She wouldn't forget those tasty little morsels anytime soon.
1153312222.title: Wrong cup, looks like it’s time for thirds

choices: The house with the owner outside
A house filled with pumpkins in they yard
A building with a sign that said "Haunted house"
The house with bones in the yard
To continue on past these houses
12.content:
You are a 17 year old girl named Lucy. You typically work hard in school and around home, however you also liked fooling around. Halloween was one of your favorite holidays because you got to dress up as anything you want. This year was going to be better though because you had ultimately decided to go to the mysterious "Vampyre Lane". You dress up as a fairy this year, completed with a wand.

You were traveling tonight with two friends. Your first friend was Emma, who was a year older than you and liked the scares more than the candy. She was dressed up as a cute bumble bee. Your other friend was Ben who was two years younger than you. He typically followed you and Emma and did everything that you told him to do. This year, he was dressed up as a pumpkin.

The three of you enter Vampyre Lane and were amazed at the decorated houses. They had interesting decorations like bones on a tree or broken windows.

"Why would anybody stay away?" You asked, starting to walk down the street.

"i bet it's to keep people away from the good houses." Emma said. The two of you giggled and looked around, unsure of where to go first. "Hey Ben, I want you to select our first destination." She said, catching Ben off guard.

"Huh? Oh okay." Ben looked around, not wanting to disappoint them. He noticed that one of the owners was standing outside of her door waiting to give candy. After a moment of deciding, Ben chose…
12.title: A scary night starting

choices: You and Emma are grabbed by a small 7yr old girl
You and Emma are grabbed by a 8yr old boy
The hand missed you and are left (But is Emma)
121.content:
"Let's start with the women outside handing out candy over there," Ben stated, pointing in her direction.

"Ugh, you idiot you're only suggesting that cause she's wearing a slutty witch outfit," Emma countered, hitting Ben in the back of the head.

"No, I swear that's not why," Ben nervously responded, protecting himself from Emma's wraith.

"You're such a typical guy thinking with his dick rather than his brain tell him, Lucy," Emma stated, repeatedly hitting him.

"Lighten up on him, Emma. I mean it's only the first house tonight. There's probably going to be many other girl's he'd be gawking at," You giggled saying.

"You pervert! I better not catch you doing that Ben," Emma told him, walking towards the house with a temper.

Ben shortly ran after Emma, leaving you to catch up with them. The three of you proceed together nearing the first stop of the night, passing by a group of kids, two being small minor girls dressed as fairies like yourself, and what you guess a younger brother outfitted like a fortnite character behind. All were heading towards the mother at the gate. Then, you peered back over to the gorgeous, young-looking older lady at the steps, and it was no surprise why Ben wanted to see the women closer. By presuming you assume the mid or early thirties, she had long raven black hair with a busty curve figure. The glance of her outfit was significantly more tantalizing than when you first saw her from a distance. The length of her small skirt was riding up to show her black lace panties, and her large ass sticking out the back. Of course, it wasn't your place to notify her of a dress code, with kids running around.

"Hello there, my aren't you three a little old to be trick or treating," she said to you all.

"No, we aren't! Just give us candy and will be on our way," Emma bluntly stated, holding out her pillowcase.

You noticed the women's eyebrow twitch with angry as she kept on a friendly smile. "Well now, I deeply apologize for upsetting you. Here have some candy for the trouble," she responded, reaching in the bowl, "Whoops! Guess I ran out again." she told, flipping the empty bowl over. "How's about you, young man? You seem strong? Why don't you come inside and help me get some more," she purred, dragging Ben by the arm in her home.

Both you and Emma remained silent as Ben willingly accompanied her inside. "Lucy! Why didn't you stop her," Emma yelled at you standing at the doorway together.

"Me?" you confusedly responded, "Why didn't you? You're the one starting a fight with this lady." staring into the darkened void.

"Come on, let's get Ben and move on from here," Emma explained, heading inside.

"Emma!" you shouted as she disappeared into the bleakness. You weren't enjoying be left alone, so you decided to follow inside. "Emma," you whispered your friend's name as the door behind you slammed shut, causing you to jump with fright. "Emma come on! Forget Ben this place is creepy," you called out again, this time using an indoor voice, as the light of the candles flickered on there own. You imaged them as special effects for the house when you herd the distinct screams of Emma in the background.

You shook with fear inching your way closer, as dark green lights came from the hall. On the wall, you could see a shadowy figure that flicked with the illustrations followed by some maniacal laughs. You peered into the room from the side, not to get caught. From there, you saw the witch lady facing backward in a kitchen, as green lighting shot from her fingertips.

"So it's a treat you want girly. Well, a treat you'll get," the women snickered, firing more lightning as you heard Emma shriek.

"Lucy," Emma squealed as she went quiet.

You dropped dead with terror as you silently moved back to escape with your life, only to manage in stepping on a loose floorboard. You nervously sweat as the witch lady came around the door. As you run for the only exit, you hear the devilish laugh behind as a bright green light grew. You let out a painful scream as it hit you're directly in the back. You let out another more severe one as a burning tingle crawled over your skin. Gradually you watched as your fairy outfit grew abundant around you as you fell to the floor.

When you woke within an instant, everything was dark like when you first entered the house, and in the range, you could see the light showing. You crawled out from obscurity, and before you stood the lady standing like a giantess. She had a wicked grin, as you peered up to her from below her skirt, somehow she had shrunk you. You were tiny, naked, and scared for your life.

"Oh delightful another delicious snack to give," she muttered, bending over to pick you up.

You squealed again, preparing to run, like a tiny mouse only to not get very far and be grasped by her sturdy grip.

"Hehe, I got you now my little one," she giggled, carrying you back in the kitchen. She dropped you down on a table. There was flour, sugar, and a whole bunch of other skyscraper-sized ingredients around you. But, all you could do was wonder what she had intended.

"Lucy," Emma called out running towards you. She, along with you, was tiny and also naked. "What the hells going on? What did this bitch due to us and where's, Ben?" she tearfully asked.

"Oh, Don't worry my little ones. My new boy toy right here," she announced, dangling a miniature nude Ben by the leg.

"What are you going to do with us?" Emma demanded, holding on to you for comfort.

"Don't you see? Teen's make for some sweet candy this time of year. So I kidnap a few that come by my home, turning them into yummy treats for the kids and me.". The two of you shook as her stomach let out a rumble of hunger. "Mmmh, I guess the kids won't miss you, little man. I know we will be seeing each other later." she laughed as her mouth opened wide, and dangled poor Ben over it.

You could hear Ben scream for the two of you as she dropped him her mouth. She moaned to your annoyance as sucked on him like a hard piece of candy. "So good," the witch murmured as you then noticed her move her mouth to chew on him. "You girl's want to see?" she asked, opening her salivated mouth. Emma looked away as you saw Ben reduced to a mushy blob of gum. "You see! He's still alive. You all don't die your immortal taffy flavored treats," she said swallowing Ben without care.

Emma cried as she witnessed Ben's tiny outline slide down her throat and into her satisfied belly. "Mmh, he was good," she said, licking her lips. "I could eat another one of you. But most girls go to my thighs," she playfully affirmed slapping her large thick self ones. "I just bag you two up and hand you girls out."

The two of you screamed as she tore you both apart from each other's arm. "Ugh, they always have to cry before packaging." she softly said, taking out the plastic wrapping. First up was Emma, as the witch lady squished her down, and moved on to roll up a ball. She wrapped Emma up nice and neat to hand out. Then the witch seized, you dropped to your knees, begging for her to change you back. "Silly one I can't undo a spell after I cast it on you. But my magic has funny ways of doing other unintended things," she explained squishing you up and packing you up to serve. You could Ben one last time from her gut yelling to be let out, as she smacked her belly to be quiet.

The witch carried on packaging other teen's that had stopped by before you and your friends. When suddenly the doorbell, the witch stood pulling her skirt down enough to fix the previous show. She dumped Emma, you, and all other unknowing teen's into the bowl as she answered.

"Trick or Treat," The kids all said in unison.

"My look at all of you? Please help yourselves, dearies," she said, lowering the bowl. You and everyone else muffled in terror as kids each grabbed a hand full. You watched as a hand came close to you and then...
121.title: Candy is Dandy!

choices: You Went In By Yourself
Ben Entered By Himself
You All Cautiously Entered
122.content:
"Look over there! I'll fit in!" Ben joked, pointing out a house on the street with pumpkins of every size and shape littered in their front yard.

"Let's just hope they don't put you out for decoration." Emma snapped back, everyone laughing and walking towards the house. You made your way slowly up the cement pathway to the front door of the house, where Emma took the liberty of knocking on the door for you all. The door swayed open almost immediately, revealing a Seven foot tall elephant woman, dressed up in a chef costume. Your first thought is that this was one massive woman, as with her height she still managed to pack on some pounds, cementing the elephant look she was trying to give off.'

"Trick or treat!" You all sang harmoniously, much to the woman's delight.

"Oh my you're all so cute!" She cried, peering down over her massive stomach, which the costume made look so lifelike. "And you, you're dressed like a pumpkin! Oh, sorry let me introduce myself. My name is Linda." She stated, obviously thrilled from your younger friend's outfit.

"Yeah, we were curious about what's up with all the pumpkins." You said smiling.

"Well I'm an elephant, and pumpkins are instrumental in our diet. You better look out little guy!" Linda says, nudging Ben in the stomach with her arm. This lady must have been pretty committed to her act, researching what elephants eat and all. There was a strange silence for a moment, before Linda started up again.

"Oh right! The candy! Come inside and I'll have it right out." She said walking inside with the door wide open. You looked to your peers, before
122.title: Pumpkin Patch House
